orig_text: A strange thing, the human skull. Not that this skull looks that human anymore. Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if it's only partially shown. The human brain even has a specific region for it. There's something strange with this skull though.$NL;$NL;You finished all heists on the Very Hard difficulty? What are you, some kind of monster? Maybe this mask will suit you after all.
tran_text: 一個怪東西，是個人類頭骨，但從外表已看不出是人類了。只要是人類就能認得人類的頭骨，就算只看見一部分，因為頭骨的特定位置有著人腦。但這個頭骨就是有著說不出的怪異。$NL;$NL;你完成了 Very Hard 難度的所有任務？你是誰？你是什麼「怪物」？或許這個面具最適合你了。$NL;$NL;這個面具是難度獎勵。它無法從完成任務中取得，也不能變賣。取而代之，你可以免費將它還原回未完成狀態，只是面具上的自訂花紋材質都會消失。

orig_text: Liberty. Liberty for all those heisters that have fallen and been sent to prison. Liberty for all that gold which sits sadly in dark basement vaults of banks. Liberty for the spirit of enterprise, the will to take what you want, the rule of the gun. Liberty for those seeking a bigger PAYDAY.
If playing as a grinder for the St Petersburg Bombers hockey team taught Sokol the value of one thing, it was the importance of a terrifying mask that protects his handsome Russian face.
tran_text: 在身為聖彼得堡轟炸機曲棍球隊中的側衛的日子中教懂了 Sokol 一件事，就是一頂令人恐懼的面具對保護他那俄國俊男的面孔是多麼的重要。

orig_text: In the name of the kawaii, I will punish you! For love, for justice, FOR MERCURY BUBBLE BLAST!$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: 在卡哇伊的名字，我將會譴責你！基於愛、正義及水星泡沫紛飛！$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL 向你致敬！

orig_text: Excavated from the arid wastelands of Tenosia, the helmet of this Agathian Knight could protect him from swords and arrows, but not from the bloody ambitions of a leader as delusional as King Alphonso.
tran_text: 在 Tenosia 的不毛之地中崛起的阿加莎騎士，這頂頭盔能在劍陣與箭雨之下保護他，但在狂王阿方索的殘忍野心面前卻無能為力。

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Wolf mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是 Wolf 面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Rasmus has an eye for secrets.$NL;$NL;Owls are nocturnal birds of prey. They are known for their large eyes in comparison to their skulls. They can't actually move their eyes, they swivel their heads instead and are able to swivel 270 degrees. Shit you didn't know, amirite.$NL;$NL;"I don't know you!" "You're no guest of mine!"
tran_text: 雷斯魔有一雙善於發現秘密的眼睛。 $NL;$NL;貓頭鷹是夜間的捕食者，因其頭上一雙對稱的大眼睛而著名。他們不能移動眼球，卻可以把腦袋甩到最大270度。不知道吧小傻逼？ $NL;$NL;「我不認識你！」「你不是我的客人！」

orig_text: Nemesis, as defined by the dictionary$NL;$NL;Noun [ahrch nem-uh-seez]$NL;$NL;1. Something that a person cannot conquer, achieve, etc.: "That Chinese buffet at lunch proved to be my arch-nemesis."$NL;2. An opponent whom a person cannot defeat.$NL;3. In classical mythology. The goddess of divine retribution.$NL;4. An agent or act of retribution or punishment.$NL;$NL;As defined by Hoxton: "That fuckin' dozer. He's my arch-fucking-nemesis. 'Orrible cunt!"
tran_text: Arch Nemesis，剋星，字典的解釋如下$NL;$NL;名詞 [ahrch nem-uh-seez]$NL;$NL;1. 無法克服或達成的事物，例如：「午餐那道中式大餐肯定是我的剋星。」$NL;2. 無法打敗的對手。$NL;3. 神話傳說中，降下天譴的神明。$NL;4. 替天行道的執行者。$NL;$NL;老Hoxton的解釋如下：「那欠幹的dozer。他絕對是我他媽的剋星。『正八婆！』」

orig_text: The Egyptian jackal-headed god of the afterlife, Anubis sought to protect graves rather than fill them.
tran_text: 埃及豺頭人身的守護神，阿努比斯想要守護墳墓，而不是填滿它們。

orig_text: Pachy the Pachycephalosaurus, meaning thick headed lizard, wasn't never that thick headed really. He never took that name for himself, the other dinosaurs gave it to him because they were jealous of his high rolls in intelligence, spirit and wisdom. Having earned a robe and a wizard hat as a second prize at the local prehistoric spelling bee didn't make it any better.
tran_text: 腫頭龍的意思是腦袋很厚的蜥蜴，但他腦袋其實沒那麼厚。他從來沒這麼叫過自己，而是因為其他恐龍羨慕他的高智商和高情商。他在史前拼寫大賽中獲得了第二名，得到了一件長袍和一頂巫師帽，沒什麼比這更好了。
通風口增加整體可控性。

orig_text: With two eyes, Jessicah would never have been famous. After a shipwreck, she managed to swim to a small islet. Circled by a shark, with no rescue in sight, she was caught. With nothing more than a broken knife, her only option was to kill the shark, so that she could safely swim to shore. But she needed a decoy, a lure so she could surprise the shark. The loss of a finger or toe would make swimming difficult, so instead, she scooped out one of her eyeballs and threw the bloody mess in the water. Then she dove in.

Dennis loves knives.$NL;$NL;The gray wolf is one of the best known and well researched animals on the entire planet. It was the first animal and only large carnivore to be domesticated by humans.$NL;$NL;Today, there's only one third of the population left because of human persecution.
tran_text: 丹尼斯最喜歡刀具了。$NL;$NL;大灰狼是這個星球上最有名和被研究得最多的動物之一。牠們是第一種並且是唯一一種被人類馴化的大型肉食性動物。$NL;$NL;直到今天，因為人類活動的干擾牠們只剩下三分之一的數量了。

orig_text: Every war has its traitor. Moth was one of them. A sentinel robot assembled to retrieve information - by any means necessary. But hierarchy and power are often coveted. Wars breed corruption, and Moth followed his logic and switched sides - causing millions of robots to disconnect. Celebrated by one side and hated by another - Moth came to be one of the pawns that turned the war.

There are things older and fouler than heisters in the dark places of the world. And one of them is Kamul. We do not know if he is the lingering spirit of a long dead man, or something that has crossed from the realm of shade. All we know is that few look into this face and live to tell of it.
tran_text: 在世界的黑暗之地，有些東西比劫匪還要古老和邪惡。有一個就是卡拉姆。我們不知道他究竟是一個死了很久的人的靈魂，還是某種穿越了暗影領域的東西。我們只知道很少有人見到他的真面目並活了下來。

orig_text: Complete the LAST ACTION VILLAIN achievement to unlock
Complete the LOCK, STOCK & EIGHT SMOKING BARRELS achievement to unlock
A simple design which gives slightly better stability.
tran_text: 一個簡單設計令你增加少量穩定性。

orig_text: A naso-buccal mask usually associated with hospitals and ambulances. This mask disables the host from spreading airborne viruses by catching the bacteria-laden saliva and mucus that is discharged upon sneezing or coughing. Both doctors and patients wear this, so you should ask yourself: am I the sick or the healthy one? The disease or the cure?$NL;$NL;In any case - it's fever season, and the only prescription is dead Bulldozers.
tran_text: 這類型的口罩通常在醫院及救護車上比較常見。這種口罩使穿戴者不會因為咳嗽或流鼻水時所產生，充滿細菌的唾液和鼻涕，而受到空氣傳播的細菌所感染。醫療人員及病患皆會穿戴這個，所以你應該問問你自己：我現在是健康的人還是生病的人？這對我是痛苦還是解脫？$NL;$NL;總之，不管怎樣，現在是個容易令人生病的時節，而唯一能救你的只有：死掉的Bulldozers ，所以，你知道的。

orig_text: Few nations have contributed to humanity as Scotland has. In every field of endeavor - science, arts, cuisine - it is the people of this blessed land that give freely and generously. With this mask, Bonnie is determined to reverse this trend.
tran_text: 很少有國家像蘇格蘭一樣對人道做出許多貢獻。對於每個領域的努力，如科學、藝術、菜餚，這是這片被保佑的土地上的人們無私的奉獻。有了這面面具，Bonniey自然會保有這些特性。

tran_text: 購買 Gage Spec Ops 包以解鎖

orig_text: Buy the Gage Historical Pack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買Gage Historical Pack DLC來解鎖！

orig_text: Based on the visions of a madman who thought he saw an extraterrestrial being.$NL;$NL;It is strange though, as the powerful materials is not from anywhere on Earth.
tran_text: 基於一個瘋子的視覺，他以為他看到外星人。$NL;$NL;這是很奇特的，正如這材料並不能從地球看的任何地方找到。

orig_text: Richard enjoys spending time with different personas and asking questions.$NL;$NL;Do you like hurting other people?$NL;$NL;Who is leaving messages on your answering machine?$NL;$NL;Where are you right now?$NL;$NL;Why are we having this conversation?
tran_text: Richard很享受花費時間與不同的人問一個問題。$NL;$NL;你喜歡傷害其他人嗎？$NL;$NL;誰在你的留聲機留這訊息的？$NL;$NL;你現在人在哪裡？$NL;$NL;為什麼我們要創立此次會談？

orig_text: A clean design gives it slightly improved concealment.

Dome was the centerpiece of a grand scheme, planned and set in motion by the other side. A simple robot, assembled to restore/reassemble/rearrange, Dome was on mission to reassemble a government building that got destroyed by the enemy. A stealth attack - to take out Commander Wasp - was taking place near the location as the Commander's car drove passed the debris. Dome saw the coming attack and sacrificed himself to protect the Commander by throwing himself in front of the car, making it steer away from the blast. Wasp survived, Dome did not.

It's not only the American government that uses specially trained operatives for infiltration missions. Japan has their own unit called the Anbu, and while this mask is only a prototype, it's very similar to the actual thing they use.
tran_text: 這不只是美國政府用來特別訓練滲入任務。日本有他們的單位叫 暗殺戦術特殊部隊 (Anbu) ，及這面具不是原型，它只是和現實用的很相似。

orig_text: Kill $progress; more Bulldozers with any shotgun using the 000 Buckshot ammo type

Politican, Commander-In-Chief, father. Served this great nation for 8 years. A hopeful man, no doubt..$NL;$NL;The 44th was one of the most ambitious presidents in history. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.
tran_text: 政治家、總司令，父親。有為這個國家服務了八年的雄心壯志。$NL;$NL; $NL;$NL;是個充滿希望的人，並且永遠能獲得獎勵。 $NL;$NL;第44任是歷史上最有野心的總統之一。然而在罪犯中，他也極度受歡迎。

orig_text: In ancient Japan, samurai warriors wore somen masks to protect themselves in war and to incite fear in their enemies. Somen masks were made from iron and leather and were tied to the large kabuto helmets, making the samurai look like demons from jigoku.$NL;$NL;No one knows what fierce and ruthless warrior wore this intimidating mask in the past. Now however, it is ready for battle once more.$NL;$NL;"Boku no ikari wo osoreru"
tran_text: 在古代的日本戰場上，武士會戴上名為頰當的面甲來保護自己和令敵人心生恐懼。武士的面甲以鐵和皮革製作，與名為「兜」的巨大頭盔縛在一起，讓戴上的武士化身成戰國時代的修羅。$NL;$NL;無人知道過去哪位殘暴不仁的武士曾經戴過這頂令人畏懼的面具。只知道，它準備在現世捲土重來。$NL;$NL;「僕の怒りを恐れる」

orig_text: Slightly better stability but decreased concealment.
tran_text: 增加少量穩定性但降低隱匿度。

orig_text: Medium movement penalty, high visibility.$NL;$NL;The combined tactical vest was developed due to the challenges of modern warfare. It is made of high performance ballistic materials and is designed to carry heavy loads, such as ammo pouches, radios and other accessories. $NL;$NL;Combined tactical vests are worn by soldiers, special forces and other organized military units across the world.
tran_text: 中型移動懲罰，高可見度。$NL;$NL;復合戰術背心因為現代戰爭而問世。它是由最好的防彈材質做的，它可以攜帶重物，例如彈藥包、無線電和其他的裝備。 $NL;$NL;全球的士兵、特種部隊、有組織的軍方單位都穿過。

Some say his racing leathers are made from bleached dolphin skin, and that his oily secretions are prized in Chinese medicine. All we know is... he's called The Tids.
tran_text: 有人說他的競速型皮革是白海豚的皮做的，還有他油乎乎的分泌物要歸功於中藥。我們只知道的是......他叫提茲。

orig_text: The common name for these lovely little fellows is "praying mantis". The reason? It refers to the prayer-like posture where it folds its fore-limbs. More commonly however it's refered to as the preying mantis, because of it's nature.$NL;$NL;Basically, they eat anything they can successfully capture and devour.
tran_text: 這個可愛小傢伙的俗名是「祈禱螳螂」。原因是其收起前臂時的樣子好像在做禱告。不過這更可能指的是其天性。 $NL;$NL;基本上，它們會吃掉任何能抓住吃掉的東西。

orig_text: Throw someone a lip by wearing this mask.$NL;$NL;The thing that gets people is the two fleshy folds that surround the mouth of this mask, the biggest lips you ever saw.$NL;$NL;Open your mouth and say 'aaah', directed the bank robber.
tran_text: 當戴上這面具，$NL;$NL;像抽菸草般簡單地用你的嘴唇來嚇唬某人吧。之所以會這麼說是因為那兩大片圍繞在嘴巴旁的肉狀物───史上最大的嘴唇。$NL;$NL;下次試試對著某銀行搶匪並張大你的嘴巴並大叫「啊！！！」吧。

orig_text: Finely crested for glory, this elaborate headpiece will impress. Wear it proudly, displaying the fine embroidery for all to envy. But watch out for low doorways.
This is a clean version of Sydney's iconic mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.

orig_text: Soldier, Commander-In-Chief, father. Served this great nation for 8 years.$NL;$NL;A protector and a warrior, and a great one at that.$NL;$NL;The 18th was one of the most unpopular presidents in history. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.
tran_text: 軍人、總司令、父親。為了國家奉獻8年。$NL;$NL;一個強大的守護者和戰士。$NL;$NL;第十八任是史上最不受歡迎的總統。然而在罪犯眼中，它依舊非常受歡迎。

orig_text: Complete the TRIPLE KILL achievement to unlock

Spruce up your glamorous neon 80's look! This kind of mint-green headwear has been in use since the 19th century as a method of preventing eyestrain from intense light sources. Coked out gamblers and gonzo journalists have propelled the croupier's hat into the focus of the mainstream. They are also perfect for beach-front raves, picking up hotties on the beach, signing a contract on the 18th hole of your nearest country club and generally looking like an octogenarian.
tran_text: 穿起你富有魅力的80年代霓虹裝束！ 這類型的薄荷綠頭飾是來自19世紀時代，避免被強光照射導致眼睛疲勞。古柯鹼上癮的賭徒和奇特的記者推進這些荷官帽成為主流。它們也很適合用於海灘派對，在海灘上挑個熱辣的小妞，在離你最近的高爾夫球場第18洞做個標記，通常看起來就像老夫聊發少年狂。

orig_text: Suppression and accuracy is improved slightly. Affects concealment.
tran_text: 增加少量威脅度及精確度，影響隱匿度。

orig_text: Two pairs of wings, an ovipositor or stinger, no thickened hairs and a pair of talons. That's the wasp for you. Almost every pest insect species has at least one wasp species that preys upon it or parasitizes it. This makes the wasps very important in natural control of their numbers.
tran_text: 兩對翅膀，一個產卵器或尖刺，沒有厚毛，只有一對爪子。這就是你要的黃蜂。黃蜂幾乎是所有種類害蟲的天敵， 在保持自然平衡上起到了很大作用。

orig_text: Party hats never get old. It's an essential accessory to any fun event, be it a festivity of misdeeds or a celebration of moving into a new home. Strap one on and loosen that tie. It's party time. Excellent.
Complete the second riddle on the Locke & Load Event website to earn this mod.
AMMO PICKUPS ARE DISABLED FOR THIS WEAPON.

Small movement penalty, medium visibility.$NL;$NL;The heavy ballistic vest is a hard-plate reinforced vest that is worn on the torso. It is a modern body armor combining a ballistic vest with shoulder and side protection armor components, making it a great protection of choice.$NL;$NL;Heavy ballistic vests are worn by soldiers, police tactical units, and hostage rescue teams.
tran_text: 小量移動懲罰，中可見度。$NL;$NL;穿著在上半身，採用裝甲板強化而成的重型防彈背心。重型防彈背心是硬板加強的背心，是穿著於身體。這是由防彈背心佩帶肩膀和側面保護裝甲部件而形成的新潮的身體護甲，提供了更好保護的選擇。$NL;$NL;重型防彈背心常被軍人、警察戰術單位、人質拯救隊伍所採用。

orig_text: The rage of the tiger is legendary, and the king of the jungle will not be contained willingly. They may think they have you under control, but hell hath no fury like a caged tiger. As you break out, they will come to know this. Claws will rip and teeth will tear, flesh from bone, as you claim your kingdom.

Who would not want to wear the head of a baby rhino. Is it not cute? Putting it on makes you feel a little stupid, maybe because how it looks.$NL;$NL;While wearing it, you are worried that it is a bit hard seeing through the mask. You will do fine as long as you do not wander off with your pig-headed friends.
tran_text: 有誰不喜歡戴上小犀牛的頭？它不是很可愛嗎？可能是因為它的外表，將它戴上會讓你感覺有一點蠢。$NL;$NL;當你戴上面具時，你可能會擔心視線不好，不過你只要不跟你的豬頭朋友走丟就不會有事。

orig_text: This mask slot needs to be unlocked before you can place any masks here!
tran_text: 在你放置面具前，必須解鎖面具空位！

orig_text: Tane was the god of the forest who used his mighty strength to separate his parents, the earth and the sky. Legends also credit him with creating Tiki, the first man. Thus, he created the world as we know it, and the people within it.
tran_text: 塔內是森林之神，他用他的力量分開雙親，地球及天空。傳說同時說他創造了第一個人，蒂基。然後他創造了我們認識的世界及入面的人。

orig_text: A horrifying mask shaped like the head of a lion.$NL;$NL;Little is known about this mask. It is said it was made by a crazy Balkan scientist who had a sick fascination for lions. Only he could see the beauty in this mask.$NL;$NL;The mask was given to you by someone who wishes you well.
tran_text: 這個可怕的面具被打造成獅頭的模樣$NL;$NL;沒人知道這面具是怎麼來的。有人說這是一個對獅子有瘋狂迷戀的巴爾干科學家製作的，只有他能看出來這個面具的魅力$NL;$NL;某個人給你這個面具來祝你好運。

orig_text: The fedora, the very height of fashion and class. Where the line is drawn between boys and men. Carry this classical headgear with the pride and resolve that it deserves. Feel the legacy and tradition of the millions of gentlemen and gangsters that wore a fedora throughout the ages.

orig_text: Custom made sights. Enables for much greater accuracy.

Politician, Commander-In-Chief, father. Served this great nation for 8 years.$NL;$NL;A ladies man, no doubt.$NL;$NL;The 42nd was one of the most peaceful presidents in history. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.
tran_text: 政治家，領導人，父親。為這個偉大的國家服務了八年。$NL;$NL;十分有女人緣，毫無疑問。$NL;$NL;第42任總統是美國歷史上最和平的總統。然而在罪犯眼中，它依舊非常受歡迎。

orig_text: A classic made into a mask. The standard 52-card deck is the most played deck of playing cards used today, and regardless if you are a rookie or professional player, you will most likely recognize this face. A proper poker face-mask.
tran_text: 將經典製作成面具。標準的五十二張撲克牌是現時最常使用的遊戲牌牌具，不論你是新手還是專業玩家，你都一定認得出這副臉孔。正宗的撲克臉面具。

orig_text: When you're the most delicious lunch on the savannah, you have to be fast, agile and cunning if you're going to survive. Corey is all of these things. Zebras are also peaceful, gentle and herbivorous. Corey is none of these things.
tran_text: 當你是沙凡那港最可口的午餐時，你就必須夠快、夠敏捷、夠狡猾才能生存下來。Corey擁有這些特質。斑馬很和平、溫和、草食，這些Corey一樣都沒有。

orig_text: +3% Experience & money reward for you and your crew.
tran_text: 為你和你的團隊增加3%經驗以及現金獎勵。

tran_text: 更大型的彈丸能造成更強的傷害。這類彈藥很難找到。

orig_text: This is an updated version of the classic hand grenade. Even though the original frag grenade is still in use, this new sleek design will provide that OVERKILL touch to each blast. Still as cheap and still as effective.
tran_text: 這是原本經典手榴彈的升級版本。雖然原本的碎片手榴彈仍然在被使用中，但是這個新的設計會為每一次的爆炸添加那麼一點 Overkill 的味道。 一樣便宜也一樣有效。

orig_text: Buy the Shadow Warrior 2 DLC to unlock

For the truly detached and impassive, we provide the Android mask. Lightweight alloys, chromium finish and really cool LED lights means this mask is ready for the bank job or the dancefloor. Alas, it does not make you fluent in six million languages.
tran_text: 為了能真正達到冷漠無情的境界，我們提供了機械人面具。採用輕量型的合金並用鉻將表面磨光，再加上非常酷炫的LED燈讓戴上這頂面具的人準備好去大搶一筆或是到舞廳大展身手。唉～可惜，它沒辦法真的像Android一樣讓你可以精通六百萬種語言。

orig_text: $NL;$NL;This mask is an achievement reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: $NL;$NL;這個面具是成就獎勵。它無法從完成任務中取得，也不能變賣。取而代之，你可以免費將它還原回未完成狀態，只是面具上的自訂花紋材質都會消失。

orig_text: Houston wore these at the Payday crews' Christmas party until Hoxton told him he "looked a proper tit". Ignore Hox. Embrace the spirit of Christmas.
tran_text: Houston 穿成這樣子在 Payday 幫的聖誕派對直到 Hoxton 說他「像一隻山雀」。無視了 Hox 。擁抱了聖誕的精神。

orig_text: A powerful alien race, described by some as the most advanced beings in the universe. Different races that have come in contact with them have different names for the Crossbreed.$NL;$NL;Strong, lean and intelligent, the Crossbreed takes the best from the DNA of each alien race that it meets, always making sure it evolves in the right direction.$NL;$NL;This mask is a Humble Bundle E3 mask . It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 一個強大的外星種族，聲稱他們是宇宙中最先進的生物。和他們交流過的其他種族為The Crossbreed取了很多名子。$NL;$NL;強大、消瘦、聰明，the Crossbreed會萃取它遇到的每個外星種族中最優質的DNA，以確保他們朝向正確的方向演化。$NL;$NL;這是E3慈善包的面具。它不能在PAYDAY中獲得，也不能賣它。然而，你可以將面具退回面具倉庫裡，但是所有客製和組裝的費用不會退回。

orig_text: Mercy! Are you bad enough of a dude or dudette to rock the royal trifecta of slick aviators ,bad-ass pompadour and tactical sideburns? Summon forth the indomitable spirit of various used-car dealers and shotgun-wedding ministers all around Vegas who wore this thing all the way to success. Or at least mild public awkwardness. Hail to the king!
tran_text: 天哪！你有沒有足夠風騷，胯下騎著嘶風寶馬，梳著大背頭還有精心修剪的小鬍子？召喚賭城中二手車賣家和逼婚牧師不屈服的成功精神吧，至少能讓公眾尷尬一下。天王萬歲！

orig_text: The identity of the soldier that wore this red headband is classified information. Leaked reports speak of a war veteran and former U.S. Army Special Forces soldier that was an expert in guerrilla tactics. His military comrades described him as tough, reckless and over the top aggressive. Based on how many high-ranking officers he tracked down and slaughtered, he may have major problem with authorities...
tran_text: 這士兵的特徵就是紅色頭巾，流出的資訊說他是戰爭老兵及前美國陸軍特種部隊而且是遊擊戰的專家，他的軍人同伴說他強硬、不顧一切及終極激進，基於他屠殺了這麼多高層人士，他可能跟政府有點問題 ...

orig_text: There once was a man and his brother. Together, they owned a successful company. One day, the man and his brother temporarily only had one client. The client got cold feet and wanted out. Rather than simply pulling out and having to pay a fine for breach of contract, the client starved the man and his brother's company to death.$NL;$NL;The man and his brother lost everything, and it is said that this mask was the very image of the man's facial expression the day that he went mad.
tran_text: 從前有一個人和他的兄弟，他們擁有一間成功的公司。有一天，這對兄弟暫時處理同一位客戶。這位客戶突然退縮，不幹了。客戶不是付了違約金而退出，他掏空那對兄弟的公司。$NL;$NL;那對兄弟失去了所有。聽說這個面具就是那個人發瘋的那一天的表情。

orig_text: New masks can be rewarded from completing contracts.
tran_text: 新的面具可經由完成合約獲得。

orig_text: Hoxton is one of the original PAYDAY crew members. After a successful stint of major heists up until 2012, Hoxton was captured by the FBI and sent to prison. In 2014, the PAYDAY gang helped him escape. Ever since he got out, he has been convinced someone set him up.
tran_text: Hoxton是PAYDAY幫最初的成員之一。直到2012幹了一場大案子之後，Hoxton被FBI抓獲並被關進監獄。在2014年，PAYDAY幫助他越獄。自從他逃出，他堅信有人陷害了他。

orig_text: The gas mask may seem like it belongs to the wars of an older era, but it is a crucial piece of equipment on the urban battlefield, where gas can still be deployed. Also, gives you a cool, wheezy breathing sound.
tran_text: 防毒面具看起來似乎屬於舊時代的戰爭中，但是它其實是現代戰爭中一個不可或缺的裝備，因為有毒氣體仍然被使用。它也會給你像黑武士的呼吸聲。

orig_text: Timothy Miller dreamt of working with movie lightning when he grew up. For a Halloween-party, he created the Golden Hour mask. But when he put it on and looked in the mirror, his eyes stared back surrounded by the perfect soft, red glow of the sunset. In that moment, a new dream was born. He wanted people to view the serenity of the sunset close-up, wanted it imprinted on their retina forever. The only thing the coroner could confirm was that all victims were killed shortly before sunset, their eyes always left wide open.
Buy the John Wick Weapon Pack to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 John Wick 武器包以解鎖！

orig_text: Default rounds. Causes fragments to disperse on detonation.
tran_text: 默認榴彈。在著彈點爆炸。

orig_text: Originally a farming tool that saw battle in the hands of the shadow assassins of the east. The kunai can easily be carried in the hand, mouth, belt or hocked on a finger to always be at the ready.
tran_text: 最初是種農具，曾被見於東方暗影刺客的戰鬥之中。苦無攜帶方便，手裡，咬在嘴裡，皮帶上或者掛在指間，隨時準備戰鬥。

orig_text: When consumed  the user cease to feel pain and become fearless. The lack of pain let the user rampage through the heart of battles longer than any other and the lack of fear make him a frightening and obvious threat for his enemies.
tran_text: 使用後使用者不再感到痛及恐懼，沒有痛就令使用者發狂，因為敵人不再令戰鬥之魂感到恐懼及受到威脅。

orig_text: That moment when you're going to finish off a Dozer but when you pull the trigger you're out of ammo. Or that moment when you're throwing the last bag straight into the sea. Or that moment when other robbers give you compliments about your mask but you didn't put any effort into it. Or that moment when someone is repairing the drill the same time as you.

tran_text: 預覽武器未裝上此零件時

orig_text: The Grin was once the face representing a man's breakdown as he had to accept defeat. But now the times have changed, and the same man is back again, stronger than ever before. Rejuvenated and ready to take on the world with a determined fierceness and cunning, the mask still represents the face of a mad man, but a mad man that is winning.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: 咧嘴笑曾經是一張代表一個崩潰的人的臉，因為他必須接受自己的失敗。但是時代已經不同了，而那個人回來了，比以前還要堅強。重獲新生並帶著堅定的凶狠跟狡詐來對上這世界，這個面具依然代表著一個瘋子，但是是一個當贏家的瘋子。.$NL;$NL;謝謝你的支持。.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL 向你致敬！

orig_text: The first aid kit is a collection of supplies and equipment for use in giving first aid.$NL;$NL;To use the first aid kit, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding $BTN_INTERACT; to regain health.$NL;$NL;A deployed first aid kit can be used once and when it is consumed, it disappears.
tran_text: 小急救包內含可供急救的補給和器材。$NL;$NL;要使用小急救包，你要先按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;放置。一旦放置就不能移動，你和你的成員可以按住$BTN_INTERACT;回復血量，快又有效。$NL;$NL;小急救包使用一次就會消失。

orig_text: The Male Mannequin.$NL;$NL;The face of an articulated doll used by tailors, dressmakers, artists, windowdressers and now bank robbers.$NL;$NL;They are most often used to display or fit clothing, but are also used to simulate how to teach first aid, CPR, tracheal intubation and now bank robbery.
tran_text: 男性模特。 $NL;$NL;這張面具曾用於裁縫，服裝師，藝術家，櫥窗設計員，而現在是劫匪。 $NL;$NL;它們一般用於展示或與服裝配套，不過也用於急救教學，心肺復蘇，胸部插管，現在還有銀行搶劫。

orig_text: Has decent damage and good accuracy.

orig_text: The wide-brimmed hat, the steely gaze and the scarf pulled up over the mouth. A combination so iconic, so classic and so effective that it remains the staple for gangsters and heisters everywhere.
tran_text: 寬邊帽、鋼鐵般的眼神和遮住嘴巴的圍巾。這是多麼經典、多麼標誌性、多麼有力的組合，使它成為每個幫派份子和搶匪的最愛。

orig_text: Accuracy, damage and range is immensely improved.
tran_text: 增大極多精確度、傷害及射程。

orig_text: Little movement penalty, low visibility.$NL;$NL;The ballistic vest is a standard issue bullet-resistant soft vest that is worn on the torso. It offers good protection from small-caliber handgun and shotgun projectiles, making it essential for anyone in the line of fire.$NL;$NL;Ballistic vests are used by police forces, security guards and bodyguards.
tran_text: 輕微移動懲罰，低可見度。$NL;$NL;穿著在上半身的標準型防彈背心。它能有效抵禦小口徑手槍和霰彈的鋼珠，能為身在前線的人員提供必要的防護。$NL;$NL;防彈背心常被警察、安保人員以及保鑣所採用。

Japan is a land of tradition. A land of warriors. Jiro's mask reflects this. The mask expresses Jiro's love for a traditional Japan, while the bared snarl represents his unshakable determination.
tran_text: 日本是一座傳說之島。一座戰士之島。Jiro的面具反映了這一點。這個面具表達了Jiro對傳統中的日本的愛，而這裸露的咆哮代表了他那不可動搖的決心。

orig_text: Teeth are scary. Big teeth are scarier. And giant sharp fang-like teeth suddenly gnashing out where they lurk in the darkness are downright shit-yourself-terrifying. With all of that in mind, can you think of a better mask to keep the civilians in line?
tran_text: 牙齒很嚇人。大牙齒更嚇人。而在黑暗中游蕩的鋒利大尖牙能直接嚇尿你。有了這個想法，你覺得還有什麼比它更合適讓平民乖乖別動嗎？

orig_text: Fires one explosive charge that kills or stuns targets. This ammo type is harder to find.

tran_text: 這是Richard 回歸面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

The rival of Al Capone. Two men battling it out as the prohibition era turned booze into gold for anyone who could get their hands on some bottles of whiskey. Capone even tried gunning him down in the infamous Saint Valentine's Day Massacre. But he failed.
tran_text: 艾爾 ‧ 卡彭的對手，兩個人在禁止戰鬥的時間的對決是如果誰能拿到他們手上的威士忌就能得到黃金，卡彭甚至想在不受歡迎的聖情人節大屠殺殺死他，但失敗了。

orig_text: True class is eternal when accepted by scoundrels and heroes alike.
The Valkyria rifle might sound like it's a form of divine intervention but the truth is that it doesn't make much sound at all, much thanks to its subsonic bullets and permanent suppressor.
tran_text: Valkyria步槍可能聽起來像某種神跡一般，但事實是它並沒有那麼聲勢浩大，多虧了它的亞音速子彈以及耐用的消音器。

orig_text: Robot wars are easy to make fun of. Dead things that fight other dead things. But as the AI evolved, things turned real. Soldiers like Vizor played a crucial role in the mayhem orchestrated by long dead humans. Humans who pushed the button, but failed to experience the consequences. As robots turned against robots, soldiers like Vizor rose, and those with a heartbeat became a memory.

orig_text: There was once a clown who couldn't smile. He watched as the other clowns brought joy and happiness to both young and old. He grew envious and angry, so to the point that he stapled his lips to his cheecks, giving him a wide grin. But instead of making everyone happy, they were all afraid, why, he did not understand.$NL;$NL;He came to the conclusion perhaps this was his calling, to make people afraid... Very afraid.
tran_text: 從前有個不會笑的小丑。他看著其他小丑給男女老少帶去歡樂。他變得憤怒而嫉妒，最後將自己的嘴唇扯到了腮部，做出了一條長長的笑容。但大家並沒有覺得高興，而是十分害怕，他不知道是為什麼。 $NL;$NL;他得出的結論是，也許是他的召喚讓人們害怕......非常害怕。

orig_text: This cap may look like a normal, standard-issue M43 field cap. And you may think such humble headgear is an unusual choice for a man as vain as Wolfgang. But this cap holds special meaning for him. It may surprise you that Wolfgang can truly love. Pinned inside is a picture of his beloved. For whom he fights the good fight.

tran_text: 梅森精銳先鋒$NL;Mason Vanguard Veteran

orig_text: The heavy crossbow traded speed and weight to provide extra range and power. As noted by Richard I's chronicler at the Battle of Arsuf "...the heavy croffbow entered the field, and yay did verily fuck fhit up."
tran_text: 重弩的射速和重量提供了額外的射程和威力。如同理查德在阿索夫之戰的自傳體編年史裡所描寫：「......重弩一進入戰場啊，操翻了全場。」

orig_text: Arrow with a poison tip that does damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.
tran_text: 塗滿了毒藥的箭矢會對敵人造成持續傷害並有機率能夠打斷敵人的攻擊。

orig_text: This helmet is reserved for the top dog in a biker gang. It demands respect and authority from your brothers, and when it's time to do battle, you wear this helmet proudly and ride at the front.
tran_text: 這個頭盔是為飆車族幫派中的佼佼者保留的，它需要你兄弟的尊敬與認同。而當戰鬥來臨時，你要驕傲的戴上它，並騎在最前面。

orig_text: Smirk, Grin, Sneer - call it what you want. As you see this smiling punker mask approaching it's not synonyms that'll run through your head - it's bullets. Sydney will make sure of it.
tran_text: 傻笑、咧嘴、冷笑，隨便你想怎麼叫。 Sydney 會確保當你看到這個笑著的龐克面具接近時，穿過你腦袋的不是什麼同義詞－－而是子彈。

orig_text: A murky green that adds a touch of subtle mystery to your profile. The FBI will appreciate your fondness for their own green uniformed team. Not that it won't stop them firing on you openly anyway!
Bolt with an explosive tip that detonates on impact.
tran_text: 綁著爆炸物的箭頭將會造成爆炸衝擊。

orig_text: Assassins sometimes leave behind a calling card on their victims and if you're smart enough only the people you want to know will know. The Rancher never got that last part and was found because of the bullets that he used. They had all been licked beforehand by his pet goat, Becky. He was a bit too fond of to not go unnoticed in the hitman community.
tran_text: 刺客常常在他們的受害者上留下一張電話卡，如果你夠聰明的話，只有你想知的人才能知道。 Rancher 從來拿不到最後的部份，而且被發現是因為開了槍。他們全都預先被他的寵物羊 Becky 舔。殺手團體發現他是不容忽視的。

orig_text: Politician, Commander-In-Chief, father. Served this great nation for 8 years.$NL;$NL;A wordsmith, no doubt.$NL;$NL;The 43rd was one of the most unpopular presidents in history. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.

tran_text: 購買 the Gage Weapon Pack #01 DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: The Trickster Demon is a mischievous being, who thrives on creating chaos and spreading mayhem. It might not look that scary, but don't let that smirk fool you; its idea of "fun" differ greatly from what you or me would enjoy. Trust me on this.
tran_text: 奸詐惡魔是淘氣的存在，他擅長創造混亂及散播混亂。他看起來不是那麼可怕，但不要讓它對你傻笑；它的「快樂」與我們喜歡的有很大分別。這個信我。

orig_text: Nilam grew up among buccaneers, pirates and corsairs. She knew rum before she could speak, and held a sword before she could walk. Nilam was without family, and instead she found the nomadic lifestyle of a pirate her destiny. She was swift with a blade and few could match her in combat. All she sought was the same respect her peers got, but this was a world ruled by men. Finally Nilam had reached her limit. Those who wronged her were "sentenced" by getting their throats slit. Her reputation preceded her, and harbours feared the bloodshed she brought with her as her ship "Verdict" came sailing in.

Tie-dyed shirts are so 70's. Holding up a lighter went out in the 80's. Whistles and glow sticks were left behind in the 90's, and the 00's, well, the less said the better. The modern concert goer, however, favors the mask.
tran_text: 70年代穿漂染襯衫，80年代舉著打火機，口哨和熒光棒是90年代的老玩意，新世紀要的是越少越好。然而現代音樂會歌迷都喜歡戴面具。

orig_text: We've never understood why hardcore heisters don't call themselves Death Wishers. Maybe it's just too damn cool.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: 我們從不明白為何強勁的玩家不自稱他們為 Death Wishers 。可能這只是太他媽的冷酷了。$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL 向你致敬！

orig_text: Despite being just a tiny, beeping sphere, the original Sputnik sent political shock-waves across 1950's Washington. Send some criminal shock-waves around the capital with this vintage-yet-pimped version.
tran_text: 儘管只是一個很小、蜂鳴球體，原本的人造地球衛星發生出政治震盪波橫跨了 1950 年代的華盛頓。傳送出一些犯罪震盪波到首都最柔弱的版本。

orig_text: Don Juan loves slamming doors in.$NL;$NL;Knock, knock. Who's there? It's Don Juan. Prepare yourself.$NL;$NL;Pro tip: In Hotline Miami, you get 2200 points while performing ground kills against the wall when using this mask.
tran_text: Don Juan很喜歡摔門。$NL;$NL;敲敲門。是誰啊？是Don Juan喔，準備好囉！專業小提示：在Hotline Miami，當你帶著這面具時在牆邊倒下，並做出倒地擊殺，可獲得2200分。

orig_text: His name is lost to legend. He might have been a King, or a mighty Sorceror. But even the great are undone by the Diamond.
tran_text: 他的名字已消逝在傳說中。他可能是個一國之主，或者一個偉大巫師。但即便如此依然在驚世巨鑽之下死於非命。

orig_text: Classic gear can be a wonderful thing. The mindset of a heroic thrill-seeker riding a 200BHP steel horse has many things in common with a heister that are not obvious at first glance- the aesthetic value of a piece of custom headgear being one of them!

When you're a thrill-seeker, and a risk-taker, and a live-for-the-moment kind of heister, it is important to have at least some measure of protection. That also goes if you are a meat-cleaver waving maniac.
tran_text: 當你是個想追求快感、能夠接受冒險的以及想要享受當下的強盜，擁有一些保護措施是很重要的。這面具也很適合雙手沾滿鮮血的瘋子。

orig_text: In issue #34 of The Amazing Career Criminals, we saw the assumed death of Doctor Crime, but fear not - the Doctor is back! With a new power armor and a fancy new mask, he's set to take out his vengeance against our unknowing heroes.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: In issue #34 of The Amazing Career Criminals, we saw the assumed death of Doctor Crime, but fear not - the Doctor is back! With a new power armor and a fancy new mask, he's set to take out his vengeance against our unknowing heroes.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!

orig_text: The zipper mask consists of two parallel tracks of teeth that can be interlocked or separated by the pulling of a slide between them.$NL;$NL;Separate the zipper when you need to communicate.
tran_text: 拉鍊面具由兩條平行的牙齒拉鍊所構成，可以把它們鎖起來或者滑動來拉開。 $NL;$NL;當你需要溝通時，拉開拉鍊。

orig_text: OVERKILL salutes you, bringer of death, slayer of law enforcers and finisher of difficulties. Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if only partially shown. The human brain even has a specific region for it. This isn't a human skull however, this is something completely different.
tran_text: OVERKILL 向你致敬。死亡使者，執法者殺手，不可能的男人。只要是人類就能認得人類的頭骨，就算只看見一部分，因為頭骨的特定位置有著人腦。但這個可不是人類的頭骨，那完全是別的東西。

orig_text: Worn by someone who does not take life that seriously.$NL;$NL;Because it is a mask of a monkey.
tran_text: 給那些玩世不恭的人佩戴。 $NL;$NL;因為這是猴子的面具。

orig_text: A mask that symbolizes all the parts in a greek tragedy.$NL;$NL;In old Greece, masks were used to worship the gods in ceremonial rites and celebrations.$NL;$NL;This particular mask summarizes every heist in existence; the anger of someone triggering the alarm, the joy of opening the vault and the tragedy of being caught.
tran_text: 一個面具包辦所有希臘悲劇的一部分。$NL;$NL;在古希臘的儀式和豐年時，面具被用來祭祀神。$NL;$NL;這個特殊的面具總結所有劫案：別人觸發警鈴的憤怒、打開金庫的喜悅、被監禁時的悲劇。

orig_text: Decreases stability in favor of spread and concealment.
tran_text: 降低穩定性有利子彈擴散及隱匿。

orig_text: Lovable, cute, adorable, cool and hip, charming, non-threatening, innocent, happy-go-lucky.$NL;$NL;These are words not commonly used in criminology.$NL;$NL;Because of you, they now are.
tran_text: 可愛、惹人憐愛、迷人、時髦、充滿吸引力、毫無威脅、天真無邪、樂天知命。$NL;$NL;這些都不是犯罪學上會用得著的形容詞。$NL;$NL;因為你，它們現在是了。

orig_text: John the mandrill monkey. Mandrill's are closely related to baboons and even more to the drill. Not the kind of drill you use in a bank robbery, but the monkey drill, silly you! John is a monkey known for his sardonic one-liners, including the catch phrase "unidentified monkey screech".
tran_text: 約翰是只山魈。山魈與猩猩聯繫密切，不過和鑽機更密切。不是銀行搶劫用的鑽機，而是鑽機猴（鬼狒），小傻瓜！約翰以其嘲諷式小笑話而聞名，其中包括了妙句「未定義猴子叫」。

orig_text: Little movement penalty, low visibility.$NL;$NL;The lightweight ballistic vest is easy to wear, concealable bullet proof vest. It offers a specially developed trauma liner which provides effective blunt trauma protection, making it a good choice to protect yourself.$NL;$NL;Lightweight ballistic vests are used by dignitaries and VIP's, sky marshals as well as executive and diplomatic security professionals.
tran_text: 輕微移動懲罰，低可見度。$NL;$NL;輕型彈道背心穿脫容易，可隱藏的防彈背心。它有特別設計的衝擊內襯，能有效的緩衝衝擊。它是保護自身的好選擇。$NL;$NL;輕型彈道背心常被顯貴、VIP、空中警察和行政與外交保安專家所採用。

orig_text: Interceptor model BX-99 was built to keep "things in order". A mission with a lof to interpret. Roaming the streets, making sure that civilians are safe and that things are "OK". This Interceptor took things too far as a situation occurred near a assembly factory. Some civilians came to harm, others destroyed, ammo slugs filled the air, and Interceptor did what it thought was absolutely necessary to not obstruct the assembly factory. Interceptor BX-99 with serial number 151010130807 was later disassembled.

The GSPS 12G Shotgun is a pump-action shotgun made in large numbers for the civilian, military, and police markets. It utilizes a novel combination ejection/loading port on the bottom of the gun which leaves the sides closed to the elements. Since shotshells load and eject from the bottom, operation of the gun is equally convenient for both right and left hand shooters. This makes the gun popular with left-handed shooters
The Matryoshka Grenade is a throwable explosive device. The doll's outer layers hides its inner workings. Creates substantial damage at the same time as it pays tribute to the motherland.
This is a clean version of the iconic Chains mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Chains面具的原型，，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Clop Clop- who's there? It's Unic! In the dark streets of New Rush City, what could shine brighter than an honest smile? Galloping in meadows, and sharing time with his friends, Unic is dedicated to showing the world's positive side. A pink leotard and purple boots make this speedy runner truly unique!
tran_text: 噠噠——是誰？是獨角人！在紐拉市的黑暗街道上，有什麼能比一個誠實的笑容更加明媚？飛奔在草原上，與朋友分享時光，獨角人致力於向世界展現最積極的一面。一套粉色緊身褲和紫靴子讓這個小傢伙的確與眾不同！

orig_text: Pistol and crossbow in one. Compact like a pistol and silent like a crossbow. Able to modify with various arrows for specialized takedowns.
tran_text: 手槍與弓合二為一。結實如手槍，安靜如弓。為特定擊殺準備了各種箭矢。

Forget bulky and unfashionable helmets, this glorious sucker is the best friend of every adrenaline junkie. The face-guard is made out of tough ABS plastic and it provides solid protection against snow, sand blasts and hail drops. Just avoid heavy blows to the head. Be the envy of your airboarding friends, brah!
tran_text: 忘掉那笨重又醜陋的頭盔，這頂豪華面罩是所有酷愛驚險刺激的人的最佳朋友。這頂由強韌的 ABS 塑膠製造的面罩可保護你免受暴風雪、沙塵暴和冰雹所苦。只需避免對頭部的重擊就好。讓你的空氣滑板友羨慕不已吧，嘿！

orig_text: The helmet of the Knight Veterans of the Masons were effectively symbols of this powerful, upstart order. When peasants saw this helm, they knew that Malric's new order was close behind.
tran_text: 這頂精銳騎士頭盔相當展現出梅森騎士團的強大和傲慢。當農民看見這個頭盔，他們就知道麥里克團長的新時代即將來臨。

orig_text: Slightly more stability is gained with this component.
tran_text: 有這部件增加少量穩定性。

orig_text: Take a walk on the submissive side with a gagball stuck to your face.$NL;$NL;People wear these for a variety of reasons, one being roleplays involving bondage. This isn't necessarily the case though, as gagballs apparently can be used in bank robberies too.
tran_text: 乖乖地帶著口球並服從吧！$NL;$NL;人們有很多原因會去戴口球，其中一個是玩奴隸Play。雖然這根本沒必要戴，不過就像口球很明顯能用在搶劫用途上一樣沒必要。

orig_text: Why bother? Let the universe expand, die and grow dark. You have endless time to lift your fingers in protest at whatever mindless chore that demands you exert yourself in the slightest. Your life energy oozes from your soul, wasted and dissolved in the emptiness as you remain perpetually drained of ambition.

Occasionally villainous, always mysterious. The Baba Yaga stalks the dark forests of Slavic myth. She flies around in a mortar, wields a pestle and lives in a hut that stomps about on giant chicken legs.
Requires the PAYDAY 2: Humble Mask Pack 4 to unlock!
tran_text: 需要PAYDAY 2: Humble Mask Pack 3來解鎖！

orig_text: One of the bravest men I saw in the African campaign was on a telegraph pole in the midst of furious fire while we were moving toward Tunis. I stopped and asked him what the hell he was doing up there. He answered, 'Fixing the wire, sir.' 'Isn't it a little unhealthy up there right now?' I asked. 'Yes sir, but this goddamn wire has got to be fixed.' I asked, 'Don't those planes strafing the road bother you?' And he answered, 'No sir, but you sure as hell do.'$NL;$NL;Now, there was a real soldier. A real man. A man who devoted all he had to his duty, no matter how great the odds, no matter how seemingly insignificant his duty appeared at the time.
tran_text: 我曾在非洲運動見過的最勇敢的人之一是我們在向突尼斯前進時猛烈炮火中的一根電線桿上。我停下來問他在上面做什麼。他說：「修電線，先生。」「在上面是不是有點不安全？」我問道。 「是的，先生，但是必須要修好這該死的電線。」我問：「這些飛過路面的飛機不會影響你嗎？」他回答：「不，先生，但你肯定會。」$NL; $NL;那是個真正的軍人。真正的男子漢。為了使命奉獻一切的男人，不論前方有多少困難，不管他的使命多麼微乎其微。

orig_text: Bolt with a poison tip that does damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.
tran_text: 這是一根塗滿毒藥的箭矢可以給敵人造成持續傷害並打斷他們的行動。

orig_text: Whether you're on the bus or in the boardroom, when Alesso is filling your ears with heavenly tunes, it's important to show the world a suitable face. Presenting Cantus - the Angel of Music and Song. Let your spirit soar!
tran_text: 無論你身處巴士上或是會議室裡，每當Alesso的天籟之聲充滿你的耳朵，如何擺出一副適當的面孔向世人展現是十分重要的。為你介紹「旋律」：音樂與旋律的天使的面具。讓你的靈魂盡情咆哮吧！

orig_text: Buy the Gage Shotgun Pack DLC to unlock
tran_text: 購買Gage Shotgun Pack DLC 來解鎖

orig_text: Find all the Gage Spec Ops cases to unlock.

Cold and unmoving, you watch them from above. They shall envy your majesty as your golden gaze falls on them, an undeserved blessing on these wretched soft ones. You unite the hard chill of the night with the dazzling radiance of the sun. Glorious, golden and beautiful, you shall turn their heads mad with desire - and it shall be their undoing.
Complete the YOU OWE ME ONE achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 YOU OWE ME ONE 成就以解鎖

orig_text: A powerful alien race, described by some as the most advanced beings in the universe. Different races that have come in contact with them have different names for the Crossbreed.$NL;$NL;Strong, lean and intelligent, the Crossbreed takes the best from the DNA of each alien race that it meets, always making sure it evolves in the right direction.
tran_text: 一個強大的外星種族，聲稱他們是宇宙中最先進的生物。和他們交流過的其他種族為 Crossbreed 取了很多名子。$NL;$NL;強大、消瘦、聰明，Crossbreed 會萃取它遇到的每個外星種族中最優質的DNA，以確保他們朝向正確的方向演化。

orig_text: Something about this mask radiates a playful malice and most who gaze upon it immediately feel a sense of unease, which is just the kind of thing you need when you're robbing a bank!

A solid backup plan and a reliable tactic for a precise and silent kill. The Throwing Knife has been present in martial history for as long as people grew tired of throwing objects in a general direction and wanted a reliable weapon instead.

This old school motorcycle helmet is part of a legacy that all bikers around the world cherish. And it's more about nostalgia rather than style. This helmet transports you back to the golden biker days of the 1940's.
tran_text: 這個經典的摩托車頭盔是全世界飆車族懷念的傳奇的一部份，懷舊的意味大於設計。這個頭盔可以帶你回到 1940 時期，所有飆車族的黃金年代。

orig_text: A truly legendary Enforcer mask.$NL;$NL;The story goes it was made for one of the premier hitters in the Pink Panther crew years back but he didn't have the guts to wear it. It'd draw too much attention.$NL;$NL;Not your concern.$NL;$NL;This mask is an Infamy tree reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 一個真正的傳奇執法者面具。 $NL;$NL;據說它是為粉紅豹小組的一位首席隊員製作的，可他沒有這個膽量戴上它。它太吸引別人的目光了。 $NL;$NL;不過你不需要擔心這個。 $NL;$NL;此面具為惡名獎勵。它不會在 Payday 中掉落，也無法出售。它可以被免費放回面具庫中，但所有的改裝與花費都不會退回。

orig_text: The West that the white men entered was a land of mystery. A land populated with civilizations of warriors, who marked themselves, their lands and their mythologies with these sacred carvings.
tran_text: 白人進入的西部是一片神秘之地。這片文明的勇士們將這些神聖的雕刻畫在其土地，神話，還有他們自己身上。

Bolt with a poison tip that does damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.

orig_text: Highly classified reports mentions this soldier from an elite special operations force. Engaged in high profile military operations and on constant alert, he was living his life under extreme pressure and constant adrenaline highs. During a sensitive strategic operation, the evidence suggest that he turned on his own unit. But no one knows certain, since the massacre left no witnesses. The soldier went A.W.O.L. and has not been seen since that day.
tran_text: 高度機密報告提到了這士兵是來自精英特種部隊，在這麼高級軍士組織工作及一直保持警覺，他在極度高壓及高的腎上腺素水平下生活，在特別戰略行動中，證據顯示出他轉為獨立行動，但沒有人知道原因，因為大屠殺中沒有倖存者，那士兵去了 A.W.O.L. 然後就沒有再見到他。

orig_text: A baseball bat you can hit homeruns with.
tran_text: 這是一個能讓你打出全壘打的球棒。

orig_text: Buy the Biker Heist DLC to unlock
tran_text: 購買 Biker 劫案 DLC 以解鎖

orig_text: Buy the Clover Character Pack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買Clover Character Pack DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: Fully automatic 9mm, very high rate of fire but poor accuracy
tran_text: 全自動 9mm ，非常高射速但低精確度

orig_text: This drill can open a Slaughter Safe
tran_text: 此鑽機能打開一個屠宰保險箱

orig_text: Combat and shooter games that simulate intense situations between players is a great way to keep up your skills in between jobs. Chains likes games that train your situational awareness and award skillfull play by gaining the upperhand in a fight.

For the longest time ever no one knew who the real identity behind the Crow Goblin was. Twenty years later people found out, but it was unsatisfactory so they said that that person was an imposter or something. The real Crow Goblin was someone else.$NL;$NL;I don't want to bore you with the rest of it but the mask looks pretty nice, yeah? It's got a purple hat, or maybe it's a hoodie, I don't know. It sports a pretty cool grin and some thread sewn across its face. I wonder who hides behind the mask though.
tran_text: 長久以來鴉魔這位知名漫畫反派的真實身份無人知曉。廿年後雖然揭開了謎底，但讀者對此並不滿意所以認為他只是個模仿犯或後繼人什麼的。正牌鴉魔另有其人。$NL;$NL;我不想劇透令你無癮，但至少這面具夠酷，對吧？牠頭戴紫色帽子，或是連衣帽，我不知道。牠臉上有著超酷的奸笑和被縫補的痕跡。我很好奇面具下的人到底是誰。

orig_text: Pump action 12-gauge, high powered but decently accurate.
tran_text: 泵式 12-gauge ，高火力但只有像樣的精確度。

orig_text: Be an aggressive, merciless, swarming menace. As you roll into town, death follows in the form of fire.

A sharp axe is never wrong, and as this one is especially good when throwing, it got popular amongst bikers. Riding a bike, can sometimes be dangerous, and you need some "protection". So this sporting axe suddenly ran out of stock as bikers found it extra handy for highway battles.
tran_text: 銳利的斧頭是不會錯的，尤其是當它很適合拿來投擲的時候，在暴走族中就變的更熱門了。騎著車有時候是一件很危險的事情，你需要一些防護手段。所以當暴走族發現這種狩獵斧在公路戰鬥中很有用時，它很快的就連庫存都沒有了。

orig_text: Using his years of experience as a technician, Wolf finally took his dream project and turned it into reality, creating the weapon known as Hungry Wolf. Embodying its creator's violent spirit, this modified KSP machine gun will act as an extension of Wolf himself and help spread the mayhem he enjoys. There's also a grocery list etched on the ammunition holder.
tran_text: 利用他多年技術員的經驗， Wolf 終於完成了他夢想的計劃及變成現實了，創造武器叫 Hungry Wolf 。包含了作者暴力的靈魂，這已被修改的 KSP 機槍將會是 Wolf 自己的延伸及幫助散播他喜歡的混亂。同時這裡有購物清單蝕刻了在彈藥架上。

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Hoxton mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Hoxton面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Arrow with a poison tip that does damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.
tran_text: 這是一根塗滿毒藥的箭矢可以給敵人造成持續傷害並打斷他們的行動。

orig_text: One half of a brother and sister duo, Alex. Like swans, they are fierce. Unlike swans, they wield chainsaws and SMG's. Like swans, they are closely bonded. Unlike swans, they have a penchant for slaughter.
tran_text: 兄妹二人，Alex。他們像天鵝，很兇猛。他們不像天鵝，他們揮舞著鏈鋸和衝鋒槍。他們像天鵝，緊密結合。他們不像天鵝，喜歡屠殺。

orig_text: 4th Domestic Operation Group-force Enforcers-Alpha (4th DOGE-A), popularly ridiculed as Alpha Force, is a U.S. Army component of the Joint Common Operations Command. Their reputation is pretty poor and have become a less and less respected force to deal with.$NL;$NL;One of the members probably dropped this helmet when he fled from you.
tran_text: 美國陸軍特種部隊第四本土作戰分遣隊（4th Domestic Operation Group-force Enforcers-Alpha，縮寫：4th DOGE-A），普遍稱為阿爾法部隊，隸屬於美國陸軍聯合一般作戰司令部的反恐特種部隊。他們的聲譽奇差無比，連美國政府都從來沒有向外界正式承認過此部隊的存在。$NL;$NL;可能是其中一名隊員在被你們打得抱頭鼠竄時不慎掉下了這個頭盔。

orig_text: A mask only for the most ambitious heister.$NL;$NL;Take all the loot, leave nothing behind.$NL;This is the sign of a true criminal mind.$NL;Grab all the diamonds and small additions.$NL;Now you're a person with criminal ambitions.$NL;$NL;This mask is Poetry Jam mask. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 專門為最有野心的劫匪打造的面具。 $NL;$NL;滿載而歸，寸草不留。 $NL;真正的罪犯都該這麼想。 $NL;拿上所有鑽石和小東西。 $NL;現在你就是個有著犯罪野心的人了。 $NL;$NL;此面具為「 Poetry Jam 」活動面具。它不會在 Payday 中掉落，也無法出售。它可以被免費放回面具庫中，但所有的改裝與花費都不會退回。

orig_text: Lawyer, Commander-In-Chief, father. Had an ambition to serve this great nation for 8 years.$NL;$NL;Consistently ranked by scholars and the public as one of the greatest U.S. presidents of all time.$NL;$NL;The 16th is one of the most beloved presidents in history. Among criminals, he remains well respected.
tran_text: 律師、總司令，父親。有為這個國家服務了八年的雄心壯志。$NL;$NL;學者與大眾都一致認為他是美國歷來最偉大的總統。$NL;$NL;第十六任是歷史上最受歡迎的總統之一。在罪犯眼中，他依舊備受尊重。

orig_text: Stability is improved slightly. Concealment is poor.
tran_text: 少量增加穩定性，很弱的隱匿度。
彈藥上限及 $team_bonus; 隊伍加成

orig_text: OVERKILL salutes you, bringer of death, slayer of law enforcers and finisher of difficulties. Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if only partially shown. The human brain even has a specific region for it. This isn't a human skull however, this is something completely different.$NL;$NL;You finished all heists on the Death Wish difficulty? What are you, some kind of demon? Maybe this mask will suit you after all.
tran_text: OVERKILL 向你致敬。死亡使者，執法者殺手，不可能的男人。只要是人類就能認得人類的頭骨，就算只看見一部分，因為頭骨的特定位置有著人腦。但這個可不是人類的頭骨，那完全是別的東西。$NL;$NL;你完成了 Death Wish 難度的所有任務？你是誰？你到底是哪來的「魔鬼」？或許這個面具最適合你了。$NL;$NL;這個面具是難度獎勵。它無法從完成任務中取得，也不能變賣。取而代之，你可以免費將它還原回未完成狀態，只是面具上的自訂花紋材質都會消失。

orig_text: A mask with a hideous appearance, the very face of terror.$NL;$NL;They say that an evil beast has many names. That must be why this beast is known as Tulu, Clulu, Clooloo, Cthulu, Cthullu, C'thulhu, Cighulu, Cathulu, C'thlu among other names.$NL;$NL;Part human, part octopus and part dragon, this is one of the greatest evils known to man.
tran_text: 一個有可怕的外觀、恐懼之臉的面具。$NL;$NL;他們說這隻惡魔有很多名子。這就是為什麼這隻惡魔被稱為Tulu, Clulu, Clooloo, Cthulu, Cthullu, C'thulhu, Cighulu, Cathulu, C'thlu$NL;$NL;人、章魚、龍的混合，這是人們知道的最邪惡的惡魔之一。

orig_text: Scarface came to the US with nothing more than two empty hands and a bad attitude, the darkness in his heart matched only by the brilliance of his criminal mind. His mask tells the story, complete with the trail of blood that he left in his wake as he began to make his mark.
Custom made grooves allow for more stability.
A small gas dispenser that temporarily enhance the body's senses and provide a healing effect for two allies.
Been a bad boy or girl this year? Then you can expect a visit from Krampus. Or a phone-call from Bain.
tran_text: 今年你是個壞小孩 / 壞女孩嗎？小心坎普斯來找你了－－或是Bain打通電話找你。

orig_text: It's time for a speedy run! SpeedRunner is the people's champ in New Rush City. Running, sliding, swinging his way toward crime and those in need, he accepts no less than first place. SpeedRunner's got the need... for running!
tran_text: 是時候來場 Speed​​ Run 了！ Speed​​runner 讓 New Rush市的人們很煩躁。奔跑，滑動，沖向罪案現場與需要幫助的人，他當仁不讓排在第一。 Speed​​runner 只需要......奔跑！

orig_text: the CANCELLING SANTA'S CHRISTMAS achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 CANCELLING SANTA'S CHRISTMAS 成就以解鎖

orig_text: Join the The Solus Project Official Community Group on Steam to unlock
tran_text: 在 Steam 上加入 The Solus Project Official Community Group 以解鎖

orig_text: The Mega Chains mask is an evolved version of the original mask. It symbolises transcendence and catharsis.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: Mega Chains是原有的Chains面具的進化版，它象徵了進化和淨化。$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL對你敬禮！

orig_text: Improves accuracy and stability. Harder to conceal.
tran_text: 增加精確度及穩定性，很難隱藏。

orig_text: The Dripper was made by atomization of a larger mass of liquid, somehow made into a hard material while retaining a smooth surface.$NL;$NL;Everyone who looks at it sees different things.$NL;$NL;What do you see?
tran_text: 這個面具是將大量液體霧化，然後凝結成固體並保持其光滑質感所製作成的。$NL;$NL;每個看到這個面具的人都看到不同的東西。$NL;$NL;你呢？你又看到了什麼？

orig_text: The K.L.A.S. shovel is used by military forces for a variety of purposes. The shovel can be found among survivalists, freedivers, campers, hikers, gardeners and war re-enactment groups. It can also be used as a weapon - sharpen the edges and you'll be cutting through flesh and bone. If you use it correctly, that is. Which you don't.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 用途多多的K.L.A.S.軍用鏟子，深受求生者、自由潛水者、露營人士，登山客和軍事迷的喜愛。它的用途當然包括武器－－其鏟頭鋒利得能切肉斷骨，前題是你懂得使用它，而你通常都不懂。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: NOTE: While equipped, this weapon will reduce your movement speed by $penalty;.
tran_text: 注意︰在裝備後，此武器會減慢你$penalty;的移動速度。

orig_text: The second greatest trick the devil ever pulled was to be depicted as a big horned, red skinned demon. Now nobody knows who the person listening to music through their phone's speakers on the subway truly is.
tran_text: 魔鬼做的第二個最大戲法被複製成大角，紅皮膚的魔鬼。現在沒有人知道誰在地鐵透過他們的手機擴音器聽音樂。

orig_text: Milhouse Anderson worked at a chemical plant handling dangerous chemical waste. As a prank, his friends thought it would be a good idea to lock him up in the room where they kept the dangerous chemical waste. What they didn't know was that the dangerous chemical waste was dangerous, and while being locked in for several hours, Milhouse was exposed to high levels of radiation and other bad stuff.$NL;$NL;When they finally let him out, he had become a super villain. He's been super angry ever since.
tran_text: Milhouse Anderson的工作是在化工廠處理危險化學廢料。有一次他的朋友出於惡作劇就把他跟化學廢料關在一起。他們不知道的就是這些化學廢料真的很危險。因為被關了好幾個小時，Milhouse遭受高劑量的輻射和其他不好的物質所影響。$NL;$NL;當他終於被放出來時，他變成一個超級反派。從那之後，他就變得超級憤怒。

orig_text: To use the Armor Bag, hold $BTN_USE_ITEM; to put on your equipped armor. Until that, you will wear the Two-piece Suit.$NL;$NL;The armor bag has only one use and when it is consumed, it disappears. The Armor Bag is a portable bag used to transport an armor of your choice, that can be used during a heist.
tran_text: 裝甲包可以隨身攜帶。$NL;$NL;要使用裝甲包，按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;穿上裝甲。在那之前你會穿上兩件式西裝。$NL;$NL;裝甲包只能使用一次。

orig_text: Hans hates people and will crack the skull of anyone who opposes him. But under his frightening appearance, Hans is a good boy. You could almost say he's a prince in disguise. Treat him well and he might take you to the Land of Sweets.
tran_text: 漢斯害怕人及會破壞任何反對者的頭顱。但在他可怕的外表下，他是一個好孩子。你應該接近可以說他是偽裝界的王子。待他很好的話，他可能會帶你到糖果世界。

orig_text: Arrow with an explosive tip that detonates on impact.

"Those pesky youngsters think they can just run around doing whatever they feel like. Don't they understand? I exist for a reason. One must obey me - my ruling and my saying. Escaping the world, just feeling free? What kind of life is that? Riding around on those yellow bird creations. No respect for the empire or the emperor. Disgraceful!"
tran_text: 那些討厭的小鬼以為他們可以到處亂跑，隨便做他們想做的事情。他們難道不了解嗎？我存在是有原因的。所有人都必須服從我，服從我的法律跟我的命令。逃離這個世界，自由自在？這是什麼樣的生活啊？騎在那些黃色的鳥東西上面，一點都沒有對帝國與元首的尊重。真是丟臉。

orig_text: You're no boxer, but you can still throw a pretty good punch. All it takes is some strength, speed and timing and you'll land a striking blow in no-time.$NL;$NL;You can charge your punch in order to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 就算你不是拳擊手，你一樣可以打出一記好拳。只要適當的力量、速度，和時機，你都可以抽它一個丫的。$NL;$NL;本拳頭可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: In armed robberies, beating the victims with firearms is usually more common than to shoot or stab them. You usually either Buttstroke someone with a rifle or Pistol-whip them with a handgun.$NL;$NL;This is the quickest melee attack.
tran_text: 持械行劫中，槍支除了用來射的，更多時是用來毆打受害者。通常都是用步槍的尾托或是手槍槍柄來打人，若是槍管上了刺刀就會拿來刺人。$NL;$NL;這是出手最快的近戰攻擊。

orig_text: Fully automatic 5.56mm, decent capacity and medium recoil.
tran_text: 全自動 5.56mm ，像樣的彈匣量及中度後座力。

orig_text: Semi-automatic sniper rifle. Fast-firing and compact. A true classic among hitmen, especially where multiple targets have to go down in quick succession.
tran_text: 半自動狙擊步槍。緊湊而高射速。殺手之間的經典，特別在需要幹掉多個目標的事情上。

orig_text: I want to belie... ZAP! May the fo... ZAP! Live long a.. ZAP! Why can't we all just get along? Because ZAP! That's why.
tran_text: 我想去信 ... 意志！可能是... 意志！生活長得 .. 意志！為何我們不能只是相處？因為意志！這就是原因。

orig_text: Sail on the treasure fleet - climb the rigging and keep an eye out for pursuing ships as you scour the sea for sunken gold. If they catch up with you, abandon ship like the rat you are - but don't forget to bring the gold.
Kill $progress; more Bulldozers using this weapon
tran_text: 使用這武器再殺死 $progress; 個 Bulldozer

orig_text: Tempy is our tame lion. He's been away for 2 weeks now and we miss him. Tempy loves all kind of cuddle, as long as it's done by us. If you spot Tempy: Do not approach him in any way. Please tell us where you've seen him. But you will get mutilated if he gets close. Other than that, he's a doll and he loves sleeping in the sun. Also don't let him see any kids...that doesn't end well.
Buy the Sydney Swim DLC to unlock

To use the Ammo Bag, you place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding $BTN_INTERACT; to gain more ammunition. It can fully replenish the ammunition of one your weapons 4 times. When the Ammo Bag is depleted, it will disappear. You can see how many uses are left by looking at the Ammo Bag. $NL;$NL;The ammo bag is a portable bag, originally intended to allow soldiers to carry extra ammunition with them into combat.
tran_text: 彈藥包可隨身攜帶，原本是讓軍人可以攜帶更多的彈藥。$NL;$NL;要使用彈藥包，首先按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;放置它。一旦放置後就不能移動它，你和你的成員可以按住$BTN_INTERACT;$NL;$NL;彈藥包的彈藥有限，當你用完它，它就會消失。你可以藉由看它觀察彈藥包的存量。

orig_text: Kazaguruma, the Windmill, is a fast and deadly melee weapon that can slash through flesh as if it were butter.
Complete the DON'T BRING THE HEAT achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 DON'T BRING THE HEAT 成就以解鎖

orig_text: Buy the Dozer Bobblehead to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 Dozer Bobblehead 以解鎖！

orig_text: An undead is a being that is dead yet somehow behaves like it is still alive.$NL;$NL;Created in mysterious ways, this might as well be a zombie as it could be a Vampire.$NL;$NL;If you are going to rob a bank, why not scare the living hell out of people while doing so?
tran_text: 不死物就是那些死了的人但卻有著活人般的行為。$NL;$NL;以神秘的方式所創造出來，就如同喪屍和吸血鬼一樣。$NL;$NL;如果你要打劫銀行，何不順便也把活人嚇個半死？

orig_text: Spend a skill point in Enforcer to unlock the Ammo Bag
tran_text: 在暴徒技能樹中花費一點技能點解鎖彈藥包

orig_text: Complete the SO UNCIVILIZED achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 SO UNCIVILIZED 成就以解鎖

orig_text: Kill $progress; more enemies using this weapon
This is a clean version of Dragan's iconic mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Dragan面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: The dolphin is the most sinister and vicious heister in the animal kingdom, tricking everyone with its friendly and cute appearance. But it's all a facade! The dolphin only cares about itself and the loot, and won't hesitate a second to leave anyone behind. Caution is advised if you meet a fellow heister with this mask.
tran_text: 海豚是動物界中最邪惡及惡毒的劫匪，用它友善及可愛的外表欺騙所有人。但這完全是表面！海豚只關注它自己及贓物，而不會為離開任何一人而遲疑。如果你遇到一個玩家有這面具，危機已顯露出來。

orig_text: These shades belonged to an assassin from a distant land. The assassin John was sent to kill was built like a machine. This one would prove to be hard. He used a customized Improved Combined Tactical Vest. He was fully armored and very tough. Behind all that armor however, John knew there was only flesh and bones.$NL;$NL;John managed to to kill him in the end. He knew however that when he removed him from his place, another would replace him.
tran_text: 這副墨鏡屬於遙遠之地的一名刺客。John 被派去行剌這位被訓練成一名殺戮機器的刺客，這次的目標很難搞定。他使用一件自製的改進型複合戰術背心。全副武裝，堅硬無比。然而John 再也清楚不過，在這身護甲裡面的，不過是血肉與骨骼罷了。 $NL;$NL; John 最後還是成功殺掉了他。然而他知道，就算那刺客身死了，還是會有人取而代之。
阿加莎精銳騎士$NL;Agatha Knight Veteran

orig_text: A practical but not very concealable handguard.
This drill can open a Christmas Safe
tran_text: 這個鑽機能打開一個聖誕保險箱

orig_text: Adds concealment but reduces accuracy and stability.
tran_text: 增加隱匿度但減少精確度及穩定性。

orig_text: This is a The Solus Project community item!
tran_text: 這是 The Solus Project 社區的物品！

orig_text: This legendary mask is a token of our appreciation to our community's dedication, understanding and continued support. From us in the OVERKILL crew - we salute you.$NL;$NL;Through thick and thin, let those helmets fly.

This is an old souvenir that Chains keeps as a memory of two long, boring months spent in Central America doing VIP security after an armed coup. Effectively, it reminds him of the kind of military monotony that made him leave mercenary life behind.

So if you're going to stick a gun in a chump's face and demand they "hand it over" you better damn well know your history. Like Jesse James, like Billy The Kid, you wear a bandana.

orig_text: Being a Planetary Tomb Guardian is a lonely job. But a job that must be done. Eons of time float by without a single living organism in sight. Stars and suns brighten the day and night. But solitude is a horrid thing. But then one day, a spacecraft breaks the silence and you are not alone anymore. Someone is visiting this planet you call home.
tran_text: 當一個星墓守護者是一件孤單的工作，但這工作總要有人做。無數個世紀過去了，連一個活的生物都沒有出現在你的視線內過。星星跟太陽照亮了白天與黑夜，孤單卻仍然令人毛骨悚然。但是有一天，一艘太空船打破了寂靜，而你不再孤單了。有人造訪了這個你稱為家的星球。

orig_text: To use the Trip Mine, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Both are a good addition to all combat situations.

orig_text: The Griefer is a mythical beast, known to have been a part of this world long ago. The beast deliberately chased and harassed common folk in villages and towns, hunting them down in unsuspecting ways. The Griefer derived pleasure from these acts and was a threat to the peace until the King's men finally found him and destroyed him.
tran_text: Griefer是一隻神話中以其在很久以前為這世界生活過而廣為人知的野獸。牠總是君臨天下地追逐玩弄著村落及城鎮中的人民，再毫不留情地殺掉他們。Griefer將這些行為視為牠的紓壓方式，也當然成為了人類最大的威脅，直到國王的手下終於找到了牠並殺了牠。

orig_text: It was exploring the Islands of French Polynesia, Bodhi encountered the disciples of the war-god Oro. The young adventurer quickly became enamored of this god, who valued the appreciation of beautiful crafts as much as the art of struggle.

orig_text: Bob Robertson worked at a purple stuff factory. The purple stuff factory was old and in need of reperations. Bob mentioned this to his supervisors but they ignored him. Bob kept on hardly working, playing pre-installed games on his operative system. One day when he was checking out early, cracks started to form in a container filled with purple stuff. Just when he went past, the container burst and Bob was drenched in purple stuff.$NL;$NL;When he got out of hospital, he had become a super villain. His face has been purple ever since.
tran_text: 鮑伯 ‧ 羅伯特森在一間「紫色玩意兒」的工廠上班。這間工廠已經相當地老舊而且非常需要進行維修。鮑伯將這些事情告訴了他的上司們，但他們都無視了他的意見。鮑伯只好繼續拼命地工作，甚至慘到休閒時只能玩電腦中的小遊戲。有一天，他要提早離開工廠。他不知道的是，工廠中的機器上的一個裂痕開始慢慢地滲出了「紫色玩意兒」，更碰巧地裝進了一個大容器中。但是，容器無法承受不斷灌入的「紫色玩意兒」。當鮑伯經過這容器時，它爆開了。而鮑伯更是因為容器爆開，被大量的「紫色玩意兒」所弄濕。當他從醫院中出來後，他就像變成了一個超級反派角色般，他的臉變成了紫色。

orig_text: Do you think you're a car? Oh? But do you think you're a MUSCLE car? No? Heisting isn't about looking fast and sleek, it's about looking furious and dangerous. Vroom, vroom motherfuckers!
Its design affects concealment but gives slightly better stability.
Own the Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number - Digital Special Edition on Steam to unlock
tran_text: 在Steam擁有Hotline Miami 2 Game - Deluxe Edition來解鎖

orig_text: A skeleton mask connected to the Mexican Day of the Dead festival.$NL;$NL;Origins have been traced back to Aztec imagery, but no one is really sure.$NL;$NL;Wearing the Calaca is all about finding the joy in death happening all around you. The death of others should be a joyous occasion!
tran_text: 與墨西哥死節有關係的骷顱面具。$NL;$NL;來源可追朔至阿茲特克文化 , 但沒人能打包票保證就是它。$NL;$NL;戴著卡拉維拉是為了讓你能享受發生在你身邊的悲劇。別人的死亡就是我的快樂啦！
穩定性及 $team_bonus; 隊伍加成

orig_text: To use the doctor bag, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Once placed it cannot be moved, but it can be used by you and your crew by holding $BTN_INTERACT; to regain health. Using the doctor bag will reset the amount of times the player can get downed before going into custody. It can only be used twice.$NL;$NL;When the Doctor Bag is consumed, it disappears. You can see how many uses are left by looking at the Doctor Bag. $NL;$NL;The Doctor Bag is a portable bag, usually used by a physician or other medical profession to transport medical supplies and medicine.
tran_text: 醫療包可以隨身攜帶，通常被手術員與專業醫療人員用來運輸醫療資源和藥品。$NL;$NL;要使用醫療包，你要先按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;放置。一旦放置就不能移動，你和你的成員可以按住$BTN_INTERACT;回復血量和倒地數。$NL;$NL;醫療包有使用次數，次數用完就會消失。你可以觀察醫療包判斷剩餘的次數。

orig_text: Always being referred to as "Number 2" the Cultist will challenge anyone that gets in his way.  Armed with with a Dart Gun, this challenger shouldn't be taken easy!
Greater accuracy and stability, poor concealment.
What better way to symbolize the do-not-give-a-fuck attitude of the biker lifestyle, than by wearing the face of the Devil. The ultimate symbol for breaking the law.
tran_text: 沒有什麼能比帶著惡魔的面具，更能代表暴走族的那種我他媽的才不管的態度。犯法的終極象徵。

orig_text: Buy the Big Bank Heist DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 the Big Bank Heist DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: Gladiators were members of a brutal caste in Ancient Rome whose sole duty was to entertain by way of public exhibitions of horrific violence. This style of helmet with its high crest  resembles a fish. It was worn by a Murmillo - a heavy class of gladiator that fought with a sword and tower shield. They symbolize Vulcan - the roman god of fire, and they stand for strength and honor.
tran_text: 角斗士曾是古羅馬的一個等級，主要任務就是通過殘酷的格鬥取悅大眾。這款頂部很高的頭盔代表了一種魚類。它曾是「漁人」角斗士的穿戴——這些人會拿著寶劍與塔盾進行角斗。他們代表了伏爾甘——羅馬的火神，並為了力量與榮耀而戰。

orig_text: REDUCES THE MOVEMENT SPEED PENALTY OF THE VULCAN MINIGUN.
tran_text: 降低手持火神機槍時的移動速度懲罰。

orig_text: The Vampire is a mythological undead creature, said to feed on the blood of the living.$NL;$NL;Vampires can appear as normal humans.$NL;$NL;When attacked they will reveal their vampire visage where their face changes and they grow fangs and pointed teeth.
tran_text: 吸血鬼是一種神話中的不死生物，吸活人的血。 $NL;$NL;吸血鬼長得像正常的人類。 $NL;$NL;他們受到攻擊時，就會露出他們的吸血鬼面孔，他們的臉上出現變化，長出獠牙和尖銳的牙齒。

orig_text: Genetic mutation is the key to our evolution. Assuming that our evolution is of the green, scaly, homicidal, irradiated kind.
tran_text: 基因突變是我們進化的秘訣。試想想假如我們進化成綠色、可怕、殺人不眨眼、滿身輻射的人類吧。

orig_text: Own the Hotline Miami 2 Game on Steam to unlock
tran_text: 在Steam擁有Hotline Miami 2 Game來解鎖

orig_text: Complete the "Knife Legislation" Aldstone's Heritage Job to unlock.

The day Chad got the Barrori Flex sunglasses, everything changed.They gave him a brand new perspective on what's important in life. Looking cool and blase became his purpose, his reason to live. With his Italian sports coat, beige linen pants and loafers he caught jealous looks and turned necks wherever he went. But it couldn't last and when Chad's beauty faded so did his will to live. He made a good-looking corpse, best clothes on, when he swallowed a whole can of diet pills.
Locked by one or more weapon modifications.
tran_text: 因一個或多個的武器配件而不可用。

orig_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 Official Community Group on Steam to unlock!

tran_text: 增加隱匿度及降低穩定性。

orig_text: Iconic, time-travelling cyborg star of the 'Exterminator' movie series. In the first movie, he was sent to kill the mother of the leader of the future rebellion before she can steal the chip left by her son who was also her father... In the past. Noted for his deadpan delivery of the catchphrase "Await my return".
tran_text: 《終結者》電影系列中的標誌性穿越電子人明星。在第一部電影中，他被派往殺死未來反抗軍領袖的母親，使其無法偷到其兒子也是父親留下的芯片......在過去。其有著名台詞「等我回來。」

orig_text: An ergonomic grip which improves stability.
tran_text: 一個舒適握把能增加整體穩定性。

orig_text: Timothy the Triceratops is one of the most popular dinosaurs at the Jurassic High. He had a huge grudge with Teddy the Tyrannosaurus though. Even though they were massive and lived together during the last epoch of the age of dinosaurs, they couldn't find it in them to be friends. Especially not since that one time when they went to that cabin during Spring Break and Teddy and his pals pranked Timothy with that horror movie and the phone call about seven days left before the meteorite would hit. Timothy did not think that was funny at all.
tran_text: 三角龍提摩西是侏羅紀高原上最受歡迎的恐龍之一。不過他對霸王龍泰迪心懷怨恨。儘管他們都很龐大，在許多年間都住在一起，彼此還是找不到成為朋友的可能。特別是有一次放春假的時候他們去小屋玩，泰迪和幾個哥們故意用恐怖電影捉弄提莫西，還說七天後流星要毀滅地球。提摩西覺得一點都不好玩。

orig_text: A warrior spirit doesn't appear naturally. It isn't something you are born with. Like steel, it is forged in fire. It is beaten in the furnace of battle - tempered, polished and sharpened. This mask celebrates the birth of this warrior spirit - the furnace-born steel given wings.
tran_text: 在正常的情況下是不會有所謂勇士的精神出現的。它並不是與生俱來的，就像刀劍是在烈火中慢慢淬鍊出來的，在熔爐中不停地被敲打而變得強硬、純淨且鋒利。這面具是為了慶祝勇士精神的誕生，戴上這面具，從烈火中存活下來的刀劍將會賜與如虎添翼般的力量。

orig_text: Violent games help Wolf getting into the mood for a heist. The more blood, gore and carnage the better. He prefers games that test your reaction and speed. Games where every second counts for your survival against a nearly endless horde of enemies.
REDUCES THE MOVEMENT SPEED PENALTY OF THE VULCAN MINIGUN.
tran_text: 降低手持火神機槍時的移動速度懲罰。

orig_text: To use the ECM Jammer, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Once placed it cannot be moved and it will be active for 20 seconds.$NL;$NL;You can toggle the ECM Jammer by pressing $BTN_INTERACT;. The ECM Jammer then has a chance to incapacitate your enemies within a certain radius. When consumed, it stops working.$NL;$NL;An Electronic Countermeasure (ECM) is an electronic device designed to trick radar, sonar and other detection systems, easing your way towards your goal.
tran_text: 電子干擾器(ECM)可以干擾雷達、聲納和其它偵測儀器。$NL;$NL;要使用電子干擾器，你要按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;放置。一旦放置就不能移動。$NL;$NL;如果你有正確的技能，你可以按下$BTN_INTERACT;啟用回饋。電子干擾器有機會可以癱瘓在特定範圍的敵人。一旦用完就會停止。

orig_text: Device that electrocutes and interrupts targets on touch
tran_text: 一個可以使碰到的目標受到電擊的裝置

orig_text: Go darker, hear the calling and become the daredevil of nightmares with an itchy trigger finger. This is a tribute to all the moments you have cheated death out on the field. You are a soldier from an army of darkness. Your veins are pumping of adrenaline and you have enough ammo packed to take on hell itself. Invincible in the darkness and ready to challenge death. All chains will break this time around and anyone in your path will meet their maker.
tran_text: 進入黑暗，聽到召喚及有痕癢的手指下變得膽大妄為，這是你騙死神的禮物，你是黑暗軍團的士兵，你的靜脈被注滿了腎上腺素及你有足夠的彈藥進入地獄，在黑暗中無敵及準備好挑戰黑暗，所有 chains 會破壞時間及在路上的人會見到他們的創造者。

orig_text: Complete the ARMY OF ONE achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 ARMY OF ONE 成就以解鎖

orig_text: Greater accuracy and stability, poor concealment.
Blow down the bank vaults and scare the crap out of all the little pigs while wearing this mask.

Even stark raving mad Killers need cash. It's a fact. So sometimes you simply must take a break from slashing teens and hang up the blood stained machete. But killing can be done in so many ways and it's real important with a hobby - and remember that cops bleed too.
tran_text: 既使是一個完全瘋狂的殺手也需要錢，這是事實。所以有時候你只能暫時不去割開青少年的身體，並把沾滿血的彎刀掛起來。但是殺人有很多種方式，而有自己的興趣是一件很重要的事－－不要忘了，警察也會流血。
叮！咚！開門工具$NL;Ding Dong Breaching Tool

orig_text: Paycheck Dallas finally made the decision to stop using black plastic bags for concealment. He gathered the nerve to order a real Dallas-mask to honor his idol, but that online printing service didn't exactly deliver the real deal... Even so, with the mask, he's trying to step up his game and convinced the Paycheck gang to raid a china shop. The CCTV footage shows that Paycheck Dallas accidentally broke the biggest vase while storming in. That made him apologize to the owner, grab all small changes from register and run for the door.  Probably blushing like a tomato behind that smiling neon mask.

Bundling money together with a strap is as old as money itself. Beating people with money is something rich people and pimps have been doing for a very long time.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 連封條也還沒拆掉的鈔票一大束。拿著它用力往別人臉上一甩，你也能體會到有錢人和皮條客才有的快感。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: The frag grenade is a concept that has changed little from its inception. It is a thrown casing that explodes, sending shards and splinters away with such force they can slice through flesh, bone and light armor. Cheap and effective.
tran_text: 破片手榴彈的概念從最初被發明後都一直沒變：一個具有爆炸功能的手投式武器，容器內的碎片和刺釘於爆炸時高速飛散，能輕易刺穿血肉、骨頭和輕裝甲造成傷亡。價廉又有效。

orig_text: DEMON! The Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if it's only partially shown. The human brain even has a specific region for it. This is definitely not a human skull anymore. This is what happens when you summon your demonic powers to get good.$NL;$NL;We at OVERKILL are surprised, baffled and genuinely impressed. You did it. You are among a certain few who stuck with it and actually finished the hardest difficulty we could think of. You fought, you suffered and you persevered. You have our eternal respect, you ruler of demons.
Buy the PAYDAY 2: Ultimate Edition to unlock
Buy the Xmas Soundtrack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 the Xmas Soundtrack DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: Somehow bending the laws of physics, the special unit of the WPD nicknamed the "Cloaker" is the bane of every bad guy trying to prove they can do things on their own. The first Cloaker is rumored to just have been a regular SWAT officer who nobody wanted to team up with. Might be because he was a fucked up killing machine with kung fu-kicks and bullets flying everywhere around him. He used excessive force almost always and left any combat tactic behind together with his unit. But he produced results, so the brass kept him on and made him train like minded individuals.
tran_text: 不知為何打破物理定律，特殊單位中有一個叫 「Cloaker」的是所有壞蛋痛苦的根源，當他們想證明他們能做他們的事，第一個 Cloaker 傳聞只是一個沒人想跟他組隊的特種部隊人員，可能因為他用功夫踢拆掉了機器和子彈在他身邊飛，他使用了極大的力量以離開他隊的戰術，但他有效果，所以一直用他及令他思想獨立。

orig_text: A tough hockey stick that is designed to be used on ice with a puck. It has however been proved to be effective off ice as well.
tran_text: 一支堅韌的曲棍球棒是用來在冰上打曲棍球的，但是有人證實它同樣能在冰面以外的地方用來打其他東西。

orig_text: Concealable optic. A simple red dot with a small sight picture.

This mask exhudes power and brute force, in stark contrast to the man who wears it. Equal parts clown-like sadness and begrudging anger, it perfectly captures the mood of someone who has somewhat reluctantly chosen to become a heister.
Trusty semi auto sniper rifle that has been serving since 1963

Throwing cards are generally associated with magicians splitting watermelons across a stage, but add weight and razor edges and you have a silent killer. Have one of these steel aces in your sleeves and you will always be ready to deal yourself into the game, regardless of the circumstances.$NL;$NL;The Ace of Spades is a free throwable given to the community to celebrate two years of PAYDAY 2!
tran_text: 撲克牌飛卡通常與在舞台上表演切西瓜的魔術師相關，但只要加上一點重量以及鋒利刃邊之後，你就獲得了一件滅口利器。在袖子裡藏幾張鋼片王牌，你將永遠準備好在任何賭局中給自己發張好牌，而且是無時無刻。$NL;$NL;黑桃A撲克牌是慶祝PAYDAY 2兩週年中給予社群成員的免費投擲武器！

orig_text: When you're robbing a bank and there's only a toast in the deposit box.
tran_text: 當你搶銀行然後保險櫃裡只有一片吐司。

orig_text: The Hoxton Reborn mask is a mask that Hoxton made while in prison. For him, it's a symbol of everything he experienced in the past years while the PAYDAY gang kept on going without him. No one knows how his experiences in prison has changed him, and he won't talk about it when asked.$NL;$NL;All we can assume is that he has been changed forever, and that he is reborn into... Something different.
tran_text: Hoxton 重生面具是Hoxton在坐牢時製作的面具。對他來說，這是象徵他在過去PAYDAY成員失去了他並繼續走下去的那幾年裡經歷過的每件事。沒有人知道他在坐牢時經歷了什麼事情改變了他而問他他也不願提起這件事。$NL;$NL;我們可以認為的是他已經永遠的被改變了。而他脫胎換骨後變的...有些不同。
隱匿度及 $team_bonus; 隊伍加成

orig_text: Peter is a true legend and has been so for like, forever. A beast with a large, pointed, spiraling horn projected from its forehead, Peter is known by all of mankind as the go-to guy whenever you need to touch the rainbow. No, touch it. Touch the motherfucking rainbow. Now taste it.$NL;$NL;Shh. It's OK. You did good.
tran_text: 彼得是一個真正的傳奇，並且就像是那種，永遠的傳奇。 一隻野獸，有著巨大的，尖銳的，螺旋的角從牠的額頭凸出來。 彼得被那些無論何時需要碰觸彩虹的特定人們所熟悉著。 不不不， 碰它。 碰那條他媽的彩虹！ 現在，嘗嘗它。 $NL;$NL;噓～ 沒事了，你剛剛做得很好。

orig_text: Paycheck Chains longs to be completely bonkers. But truth to be told, behind that mask he's just a regular guy trying to make an indecent living. When trying to push his normal self into craziness, he took a poodle hostage during a robbery when a police showed up. What crazy person would do that, right? But he picked the wrong vicious mongrel to mess with. The dog ended up biting everyone in the crew before they managed to escape the beast. News report after the robbery claimed the dog showed symptoms of rabies. Maybe Paycheck Chains will finally become as crazy as he wants to be...

Engineered to be as lethal as robotly possible. Drone was solely responsible for the Great Purge. Forever imprinted in all minds and historical dataservers. Drone had the skills needed to go beyond what was expected by a "grunt". Someone who seemed disposable. but would prove invaluable. The Great Purge turned the war: sleeper cells got exposed, robots got disconnected, and the Hive Mind lost thousands of zettabytes. Drone became a statue to be gazed upon in Ming Ji Memorial Park.

A good tactical game is the perfect way to prep before a big heist. Dallas prefers to kick-start his strategic mind with something difficult and calculating where you need to manage units and resources to achieve victory.

A tribute to our legendary adventurer [MANY GUN] CLOVERAPTOR- solver of mysteries and bringer of The Mega Death! Giving up a dream of being a banker, he faced his destiny and defeated the Cop Wizard and his minions, the Law Elementals. Who knows if it was his own will, or that of his pushy Crime Dad, that allowed him to prevail, but we will be forever grateful for his service.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL Salutes You!
The skull as a symbol can either mean death or mortality, and we humans have always had a fascination for it. Wearing this motorcycle helmet looks powerful and intimidating.
tran_text: 骷髏頭可以代表死亡或是有限的生命，而我們人類一直以來都被它吸引。帶這個這個摩托車頭盔讓你看起來充滿力量並嚇人。

orig_text: Concealment is decreased slightly with this piece.
tran_text: 這部件少量降低隱匿度。

tran_text: 購買Gage Weapon Pack #02 DLC 來解鎖！
