tran_text: 購買 Butcher AK/CAR Mod 包來解鎖

orig_text: A classic made into a mask. The standard 52-card deck is the most played deck of playing cards used today, and regardless if you are a rookie or professional player, you will most likely recognize this face. A proper poker face-mask.
tran_text: 將經典製作成面具。標準的五十二張撲克牌是現時最常使用的遊戲牌牌具，不論你是新手還是專業玩家，你都一定認得出這副臉孔。正宗的撲克臉面具。
雙持 Chimano Custom 手槍

orig_text: The weapons may change, the ideologies may shift and the accents may swap, but the balaclava has been a mainstay for the armed robber and terrorist for decades. Covering all but your steely, flint-like eyes and your cruel, twisted mouth, it keeps you warm when it's chilly too.
tran_text: 武器會改變、意識會轉換、口音也可能不同，但是巴拉克拉瓦頭套卻已經成為武裝搶匪和恐怖份子的象徵有數十年了。它包覆整個頭，只留下你鋼鐵般堅定的眼睛和殘酷又古怪的嘴唇。在天冷時也可以保暖。

orig_text: Improves accuracy but stability is affected.
tran_text: 增加精確度但影響穩定性。

orig_text: Buy the Completely OVERKILL Pack DLC to unlock
tran_text: 購買Completely OVERKILL Pack DLC 來解鎖

orig_text: To use the Suppressed Sentry Gun, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Upon deployment it will use up 30% of your weapons' total ammo. It can be destroyed by firing at it, but as long as it is not completely destroyed, picking it up will automatically repair it and return the remaining Sentry Gun ammo. As it runs out of ammo it will stop firing but it can be reloaded by re-deploying it after pick up.$NL;$NL;The Suppressed Sentry Gun is the counterpart to the regular, louder Sentry Gun as it's more used to take out enemies than a classic distraction.
tran_text: 要使用低音步哨槍，你要先按住 $BTN_USE_ITEM; 鍵來設置於地上。設置時會消耗你目前手上武器的 30% 總彈藥量。低音步哨槍能被敵人的攻擊所摧毀，當你撿起來時便會自動修復，並把剩餘的彈藥退回你的總彈藥中。一旦低音步哨槍用完了子彈，即會停止運作，但當你重新放置時，便會重新裝填彈藥。$NL;$NL;低音步哨槍與步哨槍相比更能擊倒敵人，而不只是擔任吸引注意力的角色。

orig_text: Complete THE TURTLE ALWAYS WINS achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 THE TURTLE ALWAYS WINS 成就以解鎖

orig_text: A highly portable and concealable weapon, able to be folded in half for storage or transportation. Packs quite a punch for such a slim size, hence the name.
tran_text: 一把具有高攜帶性以及高匿蹤性的武器，能夠被折成一半好用於存放或攜帶。帶著它就只感覺像帶著一台打洞機般，故得其名。

orig_text: Absorbs recoil more efficiently making for better stability.
A zombie is an animated corpse that somehow has been brought to life again.$NL;$NL;Brains?
tran_text: 僵屍是在動畫中不知何故又「復活」且可以自我思考的死屍。$NL;$NL;所以，那是大腦？

orig_text: Buy the John Wick Heists DLC to unlock
Make the hunted become the hunter and stagger your way through any heist with these impressive horns.
This is a clean version of the iconic Hila mask as it looked before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
This is the one you have been waiting for. Exact sweet, electrifying revenge against those smug tasers. Eat it, lightning bolt!
tran_text: 這是你們引頸期盼的電擊槍。正好是對Taser最正點的復仇。吃我的電擊棒啦！

orig_text: The Incendiary Grenade is a nasty self igniting phosphorus container. It ignites after a few seconds, making it perfect for bouncing off walls towards your enemies. Upon ignition it causes serious damage - setting enemies ablaze.

tran_text: 邁阿密熱線2:數位豪華版

orig_text: Probably one of the angriest looking clown masks you have ever seen.$NL;$NL;It almost puts Wolf's mask to shame.$NL;$NL;Almost.
tran_text: 這可能是你看過最憤怒的小丑面具。$NL;$NL;它幾乎把Wolf的面具比下去。$NL;$NL;幾乎啦。

orig_text: This clown used to be a master of pyrotechnics, having a fire breathing number that no one could top. His competitors in the not-so-known-firebreathing-clown-scene were unhappy with his success... And spiked his cocktail.$NL;$NL;With third degree burns on his face and an evil look in his eyes he fought fire with fire and set the other clowns ablaze. But he didn't stop there, the fiery hatred in him burned too bright. Now he seeks to set the world on fire.
tran_text: 這個小丑曾經是焰火大師，噴火的次數無人能敵。他的競爭者忌妒他的成功...然後在他的雞尾酒下毒。$NL;$NL;有著三度灼傷的臉和邪惡的眼神，他「以火攻火」燒死其他小丑。但是他沒有就此停手，在他心中的憎恨之火燒得太旺。現在他想讓全世界都著火。

orig_text: Requires the Sicario Perk Deck Equipped

Brutish, aggressive and generally repulsive, the orcs have always been a hated race. Orcs are larger and stronger than their goblin cousins but smaller and less powerful than their ogre brethren. This particular purple-skinned orc came from the Stonetremble clan who were known for their fierce warriors and overpowered, hybrid shamans.$NL;$NL;This mask is a Humble Bundle E3 mask . It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 半獸人野蠻好鬥而令人反感，一直是個被憎恨的種族。半獸人比他們的哥布林表親更大更強壯，但是還比不上他們的食人魔兄弟。這個特別的紫色皮膚半獸人來自石顫部落，其以凶猛的戰士與強大的混血薩滿而聞名。 $NL;$NL;此面具為「Humble Bundle E3」活動面具。它不會在 Payday 中掉落，也無法出售。它可以被免費放回面具庫中，但所有的改裝與花費都不會退回。

orig_text: Raptor was a fighter pilot. Hooked into the central hub on each plane he flew, he steered with certainty. It became a matter of accumulated knowledge. Even though all pilots got the same software installed - an AI learns. And somehow, Raptor managed to stay alive enough to keep his knowledge. The Hive Mind was off limits to fighter pilots, as they could be captured and hacked when they crossed into enemy territory. But Raptor learned to be the best at taking out enemy bases without hesitation.

Found in warehouse in Berlin, this designed Mark-10 bares the mark of the notorious bounty hunter called the "Headhunter". The true identity is unknown and the Headhunter hasn't been heard from for nine years. But for two whole decades this murderous killer roamed the world - executing both contracts and people without regret.
Complete THE WOLF LURES YOU TO YOUR GRAVE! achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 THE WOLF LURES YOU TO YOUR GRAVE! 成就以解鎖

orig_text: It's ergonomically designed to lend good stability and improved accuracy.
tran_text: 這舒適設計提升了穩定性及精確度。

orig_text: When you descend into the roiling whirlpool that is the ecstasy of an Alesso concert, you better be wearing your best face. The Female Concert Goer is impassive and detached, because nothing matters but the music.
tran_text: 當你準備好捲入 Alesso 音樂節的狂熱浪潮時，最好帶上一張面具。女性歌迷面具冷漠而超然，因為除了音樂其他什麼都不重要。

orig_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 Official Community Group on Steam to unlock!
Bolt with a poison tip that does damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.
tran_text: 這是一根塗滿毒藥的箭矢可以給敵人造成持續傷害並打斷他們的行動。

orig_text: This drill can open a Goat Safe
tran_text: 這鑽機能打開 Goat 保險箱

orig_text: Discourage crows, sparrows and law enforcers from entering your field of terror.$NL;$NL;The legend goes that in distant lands, there lived a god who knew everything yet could not walk. The greed of man found the god and beheaded it, thinking they could gain its wisdom.$NL;$NL;Instead, they were cursed with terror.
tran_text: 阻止烏鴉，麻雀和執法者進入你的恐怖領域。 $NL;$NL;傳說在遙遠的國度，住著一個無所不知但不能行走的神。人們的貪婪找到了神，並將其斬首，以為他們可以得到其智慧。 $NL;$NL;相反，他們得到了恐怖的詛咒。

orig_text: Better accuracy and recoil management. Poor concealment.
tran_text: 增加精確度及回彈速度，減弱隱匿度。

orig_text: You have a new message! *BEEP*$NL;$NL;Salutations, this is 'Almir' at OVERKILL. The mask that you ordered should be delivered by now...$NL;$NL;A list of instructions are included...$NL;$NL;Make sure that you read them carefully!$NL;$NL;Do you like hurting other people? Then this mask is for you.
tran_text: 您有一封新訊息！*嗶*$NL;$NL;您好，我是OVERKILL的Almir。你所預定的面具即將遞送過去......$NL;$NL;說明書也一併附上了......$NL;$NL;請您務必小心地閱讀！$NL;$NL;您喜歡傷害人嗎？那這面具非常適合您。

orig_text: A wanna-be robber tried to knock over a liquor store, but neglected to properly conceil his identity, opting instead to use the paper bag he got when he last shopped there! Needless to say, the idiot was quickly identified and taken into custody. With no hostages to trade for freedom, his criminal career was cut short. The event, which did not even prompt a local news headline, now stands as a stark reminder that some things are best left to professionals.

More is never enough. No amount of gold or treasure can satisfy you. It's all about obtaining the next pile of needless wealth to add to your bloated coffers, be they spiritual or physical. The plights of your fellows matter are inconsequential if you can gain from their suffering.
When staggering through desolate barrancas, with only thoughts for company, the last thing you want to see is the parched bones of those who went before you. Suddenly those thoughts are screams.
tran_text: 當你在荒涼的峽谷中搖曳前行，心中想著夥伴時，你最不想看見的是走在你前面的夥伴的乾枯的骨骸。一瞬間，這些想法有夠怵目驚心。

orig_text: Kill $progress; enemies with the GL40 Grenade Launcher at 40m or more
tran_text: 用 GL40 榴彈發射器在 40 米或以上殺死 $progress; 敵人

orig_text: The head is what remains of this aquatic horror from the old days, when dark lords ruled the lands and good men grew up only to die; when the summer was short and the winter felt like an eternity; when the One Below stepped out of the ocean and walked the earth.
tran_text: 這個面具是舊時水生恐怖的殘留。那時黑暗領主統治大地，好人無處可活；那時夏天很短，冬天像是永恆；那時海底一族離開了海洋，行走於地表。

orig_text: The Devil is a moniker that has followed Rust through most of his life. Therefore, Rust's mask is a combination of a smiling clown with ominous horns protruding from the forehead, letting everyone know that the Devil is here.
tran_text: 惡魔這個綽號已經跟著 Rust 大半生了，所以 Rust 的面具是一個小丑的笑臉，加上兩個不祥的角從額頭突出，讓大家知道惡魔來了。

orig_text: The Continental only serves the people who can respect the rules of the assassins' sanctuary. It's not a cult or a secret society, it's a necessity in a business where everybody is willing to kill for money and everybody in there is on someone's list of targets.
Is there anything sadder than a crying clown?$NL;$NL;Probably crying civilians, being shouted to the ground by a criminal wearing a horrific mask.$NL;$NL;Or maybe a bank manager with an empty vault.
tran_text: 有什麼事情比哭泣的小丑更悲傷麼$NL;$NL;應該是哭泣的市民，被帶著可怕面具的歹徒打到地上$NL;$NL;或者一個銀行經理與一個空保險箱

orig_text: The Mega Sydney mask is an evolved version of the original mask. It symbolises transcendence and catharsis.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!

Jimmy's second attempt at making a mask went much better - that's because he got some help from Gage. It represents the Grim Reaper himself if he was coked up. The mask captures both the crazy and deadly side of Jimmy, aimed to sending fear into his enemies.
tran_text: Jimmy 製作面具的第二次嘗試變得更好了－這是因為他得到了 Gage 的幫助。這代表了如果他焦化了，他就是死神。面具同時有 Jimmy 的瘋狂及死亡面，目標對敵人送出恐懼。

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 31$NL;$NL;Houston could never hold a job even if his life would depend on it. His life style turned him to a life of cons and burglary. His debts grew, as did his collection of enemies from years of swindlery. He needed to gather larger and larger sums of money to keep the loan sharks at bay. He committed his first major felony at the age of 24 and the stakes have only increased since.
tran_text: 國籍: 美國$NL;年齡: 31$NL;$NL;Houston就算有工作也持續不久。他的生活態度使他成為罪犯和竊賊。他的欠債增加，他當騙子時樹立的敵人也變多。他在24歲時幹下人生第一票，從那開始風險就一直增加。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Houston做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: Requires the Ambidexterity perk or the Akimbo skill
tran_text: 你得具備雙槍天賦或者是技能
自由之矛$NL;The Spear of Freedom

orig_text: Requires the Ambidexterity perk or the Akimbo skill
tran_text: 你得具備雙槍天賦或者是技能

Enables you to mount flashlights and lasers.
tran_text: 容許選擇手電筒或雷射光。

orig_text: The second horseman of the Apocalypse is War and the violent spirit of mankind.  War believes humans are naturally vicious, and that they don't require a real reason to fight or kill. He rode a fiery red horse, suggesting that blood would flow wherever he went.
Requires the PAYDAY 2: PAYDAYCON 2015 Secret Mask to unlock!
tran_text: 需要 PAYDAY 2: PAYDAYCON 2015 神秘面具來解鎖！
迪林傑死亡面具$NL;The Dillinger Death Mask

orig_text: The sheer sight is enough to drive an opponent into madness. As if made of blood and old bones, it's like a second skin on your face. Always listen to choir of voices in the back of your head. The ones that keep telling you of all the destructive things you should be doing. Succumb to the temptation, relish in your own insanity. This time, do not hold back. Not for anything. This time, drive any foes into your own roaming and frothing madness. Become the demon you truly are, cause you've been to hell and you liked it. It's pointless to hold back, the only soothing is to feel an enemy's blood gently trickle down your lips.
Complete the SO MANY CHOICES achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 SO MANY CHOICES 成就以解鎖

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Sangres mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.

Dolph the Goat represents natural strength and stone.$NL;$NL;It was found by a group of adventurers in a mountain cave in the most northern parts of Sweden.$NL;$NL;Legend has it that the god of thunder, Thor, had a chariot that was pulled by two goats. This mask probably has nothing to do with that legend though. That would be crazy.
tran_text: 山羊Dolph展現出了在大自然中的堅韌不拔。$NL;$NL;牠是被一群探險家在挪威最北方的一座山上的山洞中所發現的。傳說中，雷神索爾的馬車就是被兩隻山羊所拉動的。不過，這面具應該跟那傳說一點關係都沒有。不然就太瘋狂了。

orig_text: Brandon has a thing for walking really, really fast.$NL;$NL;Brandon is a panther, and panthers are large cats. One funny thing is that only the tiger, lion, leopard and jaguar has the anatomical structure which enables them to roar. Poor panther.
tran_text: Brandon能走得非常，非常快$NL;$NL;Brandon是隻黑豹。而黑豹是個大貓。有趣的一件事是只有老虎，獅子，豹和美洲豹有可以咆哮的解剖構造而已。可憐的黑豹。

orig_text: Greatly decreases overall noise.  Reduces stopping power.
Requires the PAYDAY 2: E3 2015 Secret Mask #04 to unlock!
tran_text: 需要PAYDAY 2: E3 2015 秘密面具#04來解鎖！

orig_text: Some of us are survivors. Tough tasks in tough environments do not break us. Used but not discarded, and kept around for company. Then nearly forgotten and left to the fire, but rescued at the last moment. Finally returned to that place of honor we so richly deserve.
tran_text: 我們其中一些是倖存者，辛苦的環境中嚴格任務都不能殺死我們，使用後但不是丟棄，被留在公司。然後差點忘了起火，但在最後一刻被殺出來，最後回到這麼及值得獲得榮譽。

orig_text: Used by Okinawan Law enforcers, the Sai could be offensive and defensive, and when heisting it's an perfect tool for dealing out quick blows to any opposition.
tran_text: 沖繩風格的釵被沖繩島的執法者所使用，釵同時具有進攻性和防禦性，在搶劫時它也是一件用於快速打擊任何敵人的完美工具。

orig_text: The future is now. This special mouthpiece is believed to be developed for soldiers of the future, acting not only as a gasmask but also give the wearer the ability to breath under water. Unfortunately, this one seems broken, but it still looks cool.
tran_text: 未來是現在。這特別的喉舌部份相信是設計給未來的士兵，不只是防毒面罩，更提供了使用者能力在水下呼吸。很不幸，這個看起來壞了，但它仍很冷酷。

orig_text: Buy Antisphere on Steam to unlock!
This is a highcapacity submachine gun
Mounts a shell rack to your gun.
Mighty horned demon. Vengeful, weeping destroyer. Do not arouse her anger.

Only a true Technician could come up with a mask like this.$NL;$NL;Featuring a state of the art air filtration system, the mask can double as a chemist's hood in those unlikely "must cook meth" scenarios.$NL;$NL;This mask is an Infamy tree reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 只有真正的技師才配擁有這副面具。 $NL;$NL;這張面具有一個藝術性的空氣過濾系統，在「不需要製毒」的場景中可以對折當藥劑師兜帽使用。 $NL;$NL;此面具為惡名獎勵。它不會在 Payday 中掉落，也無法出售。它可以被免費放回面具庫中，但所有的改裝與花費都不會退回。

orig_text: When you're trying to reclaim your homeland and King's law from the upstart Masons, you need strength, support and a fearsome visage. This Vanguard helm provides all three.
tran_text: 當你想從傲慢自負的梅森騎士團手裡收回國土和國王的律法，這頂先鋒頭盔能提供你所需要的力量，支持以及無所畏懼的精神。

orig_text: A modern lighter magazine with good concealability.
tran_text: 一個現代更易隱藏的輕型彈匣。

tran_text: 完成 IT TAKES A PIG TO KILL A PIG 成就以解鎖

orig_text: A special-issue AK that - in war and crime - has demonstrated an unquenchable thirst for blood. Legendary skins can't be modified.
tran_text: 一把經歷戰爭以及犯罪事件的特殊AK步槍，表現出十分渴望鮮血的狂徒。傳說性塗裝無法裝上組件。

orig_text: Its shape makes it stable but harder to conceal.
tran_text: 它的形狀令它穩定但更難隱藏。

tran_text: 需要PAYDAY 2: E3 2015 秘密面具#03來解鎖！

orig_text: "In Soviet Russia, Red Bear kills you." No one knows exactly who the Red Bear was; some say he was just a myth, a symbol of the motherland and everything that was strong, combined into one being. Only the stories are known and told again and again. Like that one time, when he killed a bunch of bears and came back home all in red, drenched in blood.
tran_text: 「在蘇聯，紅熊會幹掉你。」沒人知道紅熊到底是誰；有人說他只是個神話，把蘇聯和其他一切強大的東西組合為了一個事物。只有他的故事在不停傳誦。比如有一次，他殺死了一大群熊，渾身是血地回到了家中。

orig_text: Designed to improve accuracy and stability. Concealment is decreased.
tran_text: 設計成增加精確度及穩定性，降低隱匿度。

orig_text: Chains had this beret custom made in preparation for a mercenary operation in West Africa. What he did while wearing it is something he won't talk about, though.
tran_text: Chains 有這專門為西非軍事行動而設計的貝雷帽，他戴這帽時做了甚麼一直都不肯說出來。

orig_text: According to the brochure, Alesso's Boom Box features include "No batteries to slay your vibe, sound insulation to keep suckas from hearing your beats and full-face armor to keep cops from checking your clock."
tran_text: 根據宣傳單張所寫，Alesso的揚聲器面具的特性包括「無需電池即可消除你的氛圍，確保爛人聽不到你打拍子的隔音性能，以及防止警察查你水錶的全覆面裝甲」。

orig_text: Semi-automatic 9mm, Decent accuracy, decent capacity, decent damage
tran_text: 半自動 9mm ，像樣的精確度、彈匣量及傷害

orig_text: Look no further for a bad ass cherry to put on top of your Ice Cream of Minigun mayhem.

The URSA Knife is a hard wearing, indestructible fighting/utility knife dating back to 1942. Bowie blade, serrated edge, no nonsense. A Classic.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 從1942年開始服役的URSA野戰刀，它的堅固耐用絕對經得起時間考驗。樸實無華的鋸齒刃口，布伊刀中的經典。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: Swedish engineer, Alfred Nobel, discovered dynamite and its effectiveness in blasting rock. But it was drunk prospector, Ol' Kenneth, who discovered its effectiveness in blasting people.
tran_text: 瑞典工程師阿爾弗雷德．諾貝爾，發現了炸藥在爆破岩石方面很有效果。但好死不死，酒鬼礦工醇'肯尼斯發現炸藥在爆破人體方面同樣有效。

orig_text: Fully automatic 7.62mm, High powered but low controllability
tran_text: 全自動 7.62mm ，高火力但難以控制

orig_text: "Be the change you want to see in the world."$NL;$NL;That's what the Optimist believes.$NL;$NL;As the leader of a peaceful group of robots, he feels it is his responsibility to combat rival bands of robots obsessed with negativity and extermination. His prime weapon: rolling out positivity through constructive reasoning and unbiased logic.$NL;$NL;Or through forced upgrades. Which are compulsory.$NL;$NL;This mask is Poetry Jam mask. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 「欲變世界，先變其身。」$NL;$NL;這是柯柏文的信條。$NL;$NL;作為機器人和平組織的領袖，他意識到他的使命是對抗與之相對深陷消極絕望的機器人。他的主要武器：推廣積極建設性的理念以及公平無私的邏輯。$NL;$NL;或者給予它們強制性的升級。沒錯，強制。$NL;$NL;這個面具是Poetry Jam面具。它不能在遊戲中掉落以及售出。取而代之，它可以免費退回至你的面具儲藏欄，但任何自定義以及為此支出的費用將會丟失。

orig_text: One half of a brother and sister duo, Alex. Like swans, they are fierce. Unlike swans, they wield chainsaws and SMGs. Like swans, they are closely bonded. Unlike swans, they have a penchant for slaughter.
Greater accuracy and stability, poor concealment.

A machete is a large cleaver-like knife frequently used in tropical countries to cut through rain forest undergrowth, rebellions and for agricultural purposes. It is common to see people using machetes for other jobs as well, such as splitting open coconuts, skulls, yard work and robbing banks.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 開山刀源於熱帶雨林的剁刀型單刃大刀，常用於開山闢路、協助農務和武裝衝突等方面。開山刀亦很常被用於各種不同的工作，例如破開椰子、砍下頭顱、收割農作物，以及搶劫銀行。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: "Kill $progress; more Shields using any Shotgun with the Slug ammo type"
tran_text: 「使用任何配備重彈頭的霰彈槍再殺死 $progress; 個盾兵 (Shield)」

orig_text: The Robot was an honored member of the killbot army. When commanded by his master, EMP-R0R to kill the leader of the human resistance, he broke protocol, failing to eliminate humanity.

orig_text: This is one tough cookie. The criminal part of St. Clair was born as she went through hell one dark night. After that, she dove deep into the shady world of illegality. But she was also an advocate for civil rights and police corruption. Like a modern day, twisted version of Robin Hood one might say.

Clint the black-capped squirrel monkey. Not really a monkey without a name. Just like the real Clint, this monkey doesn't fuck around. It minds its own business. Doesn't talk unless talked to, knowing that the less it says the stronger it becomes. When it actually tries to say something it ends up screeching because it's a FUCKING MONKEY.
tran_text: 克林特是隻黑頂松鼠猴。它是只有名字的猴子。就像真正的克林特一樣，它不會瞎惹事，只會管好自己。不輕易開口，因其深知沉默是金。當它開始說話的時候它就不抓耳撓腮了，因為他媽的這是隻猴子。

orig_text: Eight legs strong, tarantula sizes range from as small as a fingernail to as large as a handgun when the legs are fully extended. The name originally comes from the name Lycosa tarantula, a species of wolf spider. Tarantulas generally hunt in trees, on or near the ground. They're also popular as pets.
tran_text: 毛蜘蛛擁有八條強勁的腿，尺寸一開始只有手指大小，待腿部發育完全後則有手槍大小。其主要得名於黑腹狼蛛，是狼蛛的一種。毛蜘蛛一般在樹上捕獵，有時也會在近地面。它們同樣是種流行的寵物。

orig_text: The Asilidae, also known as robber fly or assassin fly, are powerfully built, bristly flies who are known for their notoriously aggressive predatory habits. They feed on other insects and as a rule, they wait in ambush and catch their prey in flight.
tran_text: 食蟲虻又被稱為搶匪蠅或刺客蠅，有著非常強健的體形，並以其好鬥的掠食性而臭名昭彰。它們以其他昆蟲為食，一般情況下它們會伏擊並抓住飛行的獵物。

orig_text: Wearing brightly coloured clothes and eccentric hats in a motley pattern, jesters have always had a place in these parts.$NL;$NL;Whether walking on stilts, performing with fire or telling jokes; their sole purpose is to spread joy in our hearts.$NL;$NL;However, this is your time to shine so why not put on the mask and spread some joy.$NL;$NL;So, pull out your gun, rob your guests and tell them it was all a big ploy.
tran_text: 穿著艷麗的服飾戴著古怪的混雜圖樣的帽子，小丑們總在身上帶有這樣的裝飾。$NL;$NL;無論是踩高蹺，噴火表演或者講笑話；他們唯一的目的是在我們心中傳遞快樂。$NL;$NL;實際上，現在是你展現的時候了戴上面具傳播快樂。$NL;$NL;所以，掏出你的大槍，搶劫你的客人然後告訴他們這是一場大計劃。

orig_text: Doctor Crime is an American fictional character, a supervillain who appears in comic books by OVERKILL Comics.$NL;$NL;The character was created by writer-editor David Goldfarb and designed by artist Max Elmberg Sjöholm.$NL;$NL;He made his first appearance in The Amazing Career Criminals: The PAYDAY gang meets Doctor Crime!
tran_text: 犯罪博士是出現在美國 OVERKILL 漫畫的虛構超級壞蛋。$NL;$NL;他是由編劇編輯 David Goldfarb 和漫畫家 Max Elmberg Sjöholm 共同創作。$NL;$NL;犯罪博士首次出現於《驚奇職業罪犯#5：PAYDAY 幫遇上犯罪博士！》一書中。

orig_text: On gloomy nights when the moon is bright, one might witness how The Clawer emerges from the watery depths. It yearns for fresh meat and won't stop until its hunger is still. The Clawer is one of those urban myths that campfire teens tell - just before The Clawer strikes. Afterwards, it returns to the deep. Hibernating until its stomach growls yet again.
tran_text: 在憂悶的夜晚如果月光夠亮的話，你可能可以看到 Clawer 是怎麼從水的深處爬出來的。他渴望著新鮮的肉，在他的飢餓消失之前，他是不會停下的。 Clawer 是那種去露營的青少年晚上會在營火前說的都市傳說，就在 Clawer 出擊之前。在那之後，他就會回到水底深處。深深地進入休眠，直到他的肚子再次發出哀號。

orig_text: Lean, mean, green killing machine. The perfect mask to wear when you're in a pickle and need to make like a banana and split. Be water, my friend.
Dodging a cloaker kick and your buddy gets hit. Lol.
tran_text: 閃避cloaker一腳然後你的蛋蛋被踹中了，哈哈哈哈哈。

orig_text: This mask is a modern interpretation of the Egyptian war-god Maahes. Known as the "Wield of the Knife", "Lord of Slaughter" and "Avenger of Wrongs", Maahes punished those who transgressed from the rules of Ma`at - the personification of order and balance. Considered the embodiment of the burning heat of the sun, he was also seen as a protective deity that defended the Pharaoh during battle.$NL;$NL;He is usually depicted as lion-headed man carrying a knife wearing the Atef crown, the Solar Disk or is pictured as a lion devouring a victim.
tran_text: 這張面具是對古埃及戰神瑪耶斯的現代演繹。瑪耶斯被稱為「持刀者」，「屠殺領主」與「伸冤復仇者」，會懲罰那些違背秩序與平衡之神——瑪阿特戒律的人。被視為太陽化身的他，也被當作是戰鬥中法老的守護者。 $NL;$NL;他經常被描述為一個獅子頭的男人，拿著一把小刀，戴著日輪和阿特夫的皇冠，或者被描述成一隻獅子正在吞噬受害者。

orig_text: A witch is someone practicing black witchcraft, often with the aid of a devil or familiar.$NL;$NL;It can be anything from an ugly old hag to a charming, alluring woman.$NL;$NL;And then you have the broom, the hat and all that. Boo.
tran_text: 女巫就是那些透過惡魔或是使魔的幫助下使用黑巫術的人。$NL;$NL;她可以是個醜陋的老巫婆，或是迷人的美女。$NL;$NL;當然別忘了掃帚、尖帽以及那身打扮，Boo。

orig_text: The Marine was a guard stationed at Primerdyne R&D when an experiment went awry and unleashing an Interdimensional Horror into the facility. Some say he left everyone behind to die, others celebrate him as a hero who saved everyone!

Brother of Tane, Tawhiri is the god of weather, most particularly violent storms and lightning. Bodhi experienced plenty of both, and it was during a particularly vicious explosion while reef-diving in Tuvalu that Bodhi gained a true appreciation for this powerful deity.
tran_text: 塔內的兄弟，滔希利是天氣之神，主要是暴力的風暴及閃電。 Bodhi 同時經歷了兩個，當在吐瓦魯的堡礁潛水時，它發生了劇烈的爆炸， Bodhi 對這力量強的神致敬。

orig_text: Ritually prepared, the cranium removed from the head, eyes and mouth sewn shut. Boiled in hot water, dried with hot rocks and sand and molded to keep the features of a human face.$NL;$NL;Taken by ship to the Americas by Westerners long ago, it now somehow has ended up in your possession.
tran_text: 儀式已準備，頭蓋已從頭部移除，眼睛和嘴巴已縫起來。在熱水中煮熟，用熱的岩石和沙子曬乾並模製保持人臉特徵。 $NL;$NL;很久之前就被西方人運到了美洲，現在不知怎麼的就落在了你的手裡。

orig_text: The Gage Blade is one of Gage's own personal favorite ballistic face masks. It will protect your face from one or two 9mm bullets before your head explodes.$NL;$NL;Without this mask, Gage wouldn't be the wonderful human being he is today.
tran_text: Gage 戰士是 Gage 私人珍藏的防彈面具之一。它可以擋下一兩顆9毫米子彈以免你被爆頭之前就先給毀容。$NL;$NL;假如沒了這頂面具，Gage 就絕對不是今時今日你所認識的英俊小生。

orig_text: In space you need a trusted companion. As everything from huge monsters on distant planets to space itself is deadly - you need an ally. Not just a hired gun. But instead a friend and a soldier that makes sure that you survive and others don't. Be happy that Garreth is on your team. Be happy that he helps you shepherd the herd
tran_text: 在太空中你需要一個可以信任的夥伴，因為所有東西從大型的怪物到遙遠的星球，甚至太空本身都是致命的。你需要一個盟友，不只是一個傭兵。而是一個朋友，一個會確保你活下來而其他人不會的士兵。你要慶幸Garreth是跟你同隊的，你要慶幸有他幫你牧放羊群。

orig_text: Pazuzu was the king of the wind demons according to ancient Babylonian mythology. Legends also tell of him as a beastial behemoth fighting groups of adveturers in far away lands, and some even say he walked the earth as an immortal warrior in human form.

orig_text: As you walk down the corridor you see this scary, but also somewhat slow guy. Hovering there, ominously. Hard to tell if he's a threat or just floating around a bit. But then. A blast breaks the silence and you cease to exist. So next time you meet Floating Guy: come prepared and don't take him lightly.
tran_text: 當你走在走廊上時，你看到這個恐怖卻有有點緩慢的傢伙，就這樣不詳的浮在半空中。很難說他到底是不是有威脅性的，還是就只是這樣飄在那裏。但是突然，一個爆炸打破了寂靜，而你只能轉身就跑。所以下一次當你遇到漂浮仔的時候，做好準備，並不要小看他。

orig_text: Clover's mask represents what Clover both fears and hates most of all - wearing a mask as your normal face. orig_text: This mask is based on the experiments of the peculiar Dr Rudolf Mastaba. A modern Prometheus, he sought to return life to the dead with the application of Industrial Revolution technology. Rumour suggests that he was partly successful - the undead rose, but had an insatiable appetite for wheat, barley and maize.
tran_text: 這個面具基於古怪的魯道夫·馬斯塔巴博士的實驗。作為一個現代普羅米修斯，他試圖應用工業革命的技術將死人復生。有傳言說他在某種意義上成功了——亡靈站了起來，但是只吃小麥，大麥和玉米。

orig_text: Increases melee damage and knockdown while using weapon butt.
tran_text: 使用這刺刀增加近戰傷害及擊倒能力。

orig_text: Secret fighting style found far in offshore territories
tran_text: 在遙遠的海的對岸的領土裡發現的秘密武術

orig_text: Complete the UNUSUAL SUSPECTS achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 UNUSUAL SUSPECTS 成就以解鎖

orig_text: It would be lovely to think Sterling earned the beret and badge through hard-training and combat. The truth, however, is that he saw how it impressed a couple of young fillies at the Officers Club. An invitation to step outside, a few dirty punches and a knocked out Colonel later, and Sterling had his very own red beret. And a couple of fillies. Smashing!

Once, they strode among us. Cyclopean beings, tall as towers. They were old, even when our primate ancestors howled at fire. Now, they are gone, and only their shades come to us in half-dreamt race memories.
tran_text: 曾經，他們在我們之中跨步前行。獨眼巨人，高聳如塔。他們太老了，即便我們靈長類的祖先對他們咆哮也無動於衷。現在，他們早已消逝人間，只留下他們的夢魘還在夢境中追逐著我們。

orig_text: Its ergonomics and profile gives it great stability.
tran_text: 它的舒適及輪廓給予它較好的穩定性。

orig_text: The Berger Combat Knife is a popular tactical knife with a folding clip point blade. Compact, light and high tech materials makes a fast and dangerous tool.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 很受歡迎的Berger戰鬥刀是一把刀尖銳利的可摺疊戰術小刀。以輕巧的高科技物料所打造的危險工具。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: Buy the Point Break DLC to unlock
tran_text: 購買 Point Break DLC 以解鎖

orig_text: Chuck the Eagle represents everything that is righteous, good and true.$NL;$NL;A famous Martial Artist found this huge eagle while he was doing karate in the mountains of Alaska.$NL;$NL;They had a fight for several hours but eventually the Martial Artist won. He took the head, made it into a mask and named it after himself.
tran_text: 大鵰查克象徵正義、善良和真相。$NL;$NL;一位有名的武術家在阿拉斯加的山上打跆拳道時發現的大鵰。$NL;$NL;他們鬥了好幾個小時，最後武術家勝出。他把大鵰的頭徒手扯下，做成面具，並以自己的名字命名。

orig_text: Evil and treacherous in a haunting way, this mask is said to change the wearer in mysterious ways.$NL;$NL;Worn long enough, it is said it turns the wearers heart into a black one, filled with lust for black deeds.
tran_text: 邪惡和危險，讓人難以忘懷，該面具據說可以神秘地改變穿戴者。 $NL;$NL;戴的時間足夠長，據說就可以讓穿著者的心成為黑心，充滿黑暗邪惡。

orig_text: Great recoil management gives it better stability.
Why settle with one blade when you can have multiple?
tran_text: 當你可以用兩把刀的時候，你還會只用一把刀嗎？

orig_text: This mask belonged to a mysterious warrior from far away place. He walked the lands, guided by his intuition, hunting evil forces across the world. He ventured to dungeons and slew thousands of evil beings he came across. In the end, he found peace, knowing that the next generation would continue as he did.

The face of a mummy that has had its skin and organs preserved. Either intentional or incidental exposure to extreme cold (ice mummies!), low humidity, lack of air or chemicals might have caused this.$NL;$NL;Who knows what part of the world it is from? Having been preserved for the longest time, its ready to be exposed to the world again.
tran_text: 一具皮膚和器官保存完好的木乃伊臉部。是故意為之或偶然暴露於極端寒冷（冰凍木乃伊！），濕度低，缺乏空氣或化學物質而造成此現象。 $NL;$NL;誰知道它是來自世界的哪一個地方嗎？在長時間保存之後，它要重現於世了。

orig_text: When you rat out the PAYDAY gang, you need to expect some form of retribution. And the gang aren't big on wagging fingers and a stern telling off. You can expect bullets, and plenty of them. This hard hat is old school riot cop tech - heavy iron, fronted with reinforced glass. Good luck getting through it.
tran_text: 當你從PayDay幫退出時，你就要有被追殺的心理準備了。別期望他們只是動動手指或是動口來責備你，他們非常地不擅長。你可以期待的是，子彈、子彈，還有......喔對了，更多的子彈！這頂頭盔是舊式鎮暴警察的技術－－用重鋼板所製成，並在前面裝上了強化玻璃。祝你好運，撐過去吧！

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Dallas mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Dallas面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Kill $progress; enemies while in stealth using the Trench knife
tran_text: 在潛行時使用壕溝野戰刀個敵人 $progress; 個敵人

orig_text: An exclusive mask representing death and mortality.$NL;$NL;Created in the heavens as a gift by the gods to men and women who believed in them early on, who built their shrines and spread their beliefs across the lands.$NL;$NL;Thank you for believing in us! We salute you!
tran_text: 代表死亡的獨特面具。 $NL;$NL;由天神在天堂創造作為禮物給予那些早期相信神靈的男女，他們建造了眾神的神殿並傳播他們的信仰，遍及大地。 $NL;$NL;謝謝你相信我們！我們向你致敬！

orig_text: Whether you're a murderous desperado or a lone, brooding ranger, sometimes you need to hide your identity. What does that better than a slender black eye-mask, covering a third of your face?
tran_text: 無論你是殺人如麻的亡命之徒，還是來去匆匆的孤獨遊俠，你總有需要掩飾身份的時候。有什麼好得過一條能遮蓋著你三份一個臉孔的黑色眼罩？

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Bonnie mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Bonnie面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: This mask exudes power and brute force, in stark contrast to the man who wears it. Equal parts clown-like sadness and begrudging anger, it perfectly captures the mood of someone who has somewhat reluctantly chosen to become a heister.
This is a clean version of Ethan's mask as it looked before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
Way back in the day, on a secret and highly dangerous mercenary mission in Southeast Asia, Chains acquired this old US Army helmet. No one knows who the previous owner was.
tran_text: 回來的一天，在東南亞的一個秘密及極危險的僱傭兵任務， Chains 拿到了這個古老的美國軍人面具，沒有人知道之前的擁有者是誰。

orig_text: You can't use this while $ability; is active.

Strike fast, strike hard, strike silently. You will leave even the cloakers sulking in shame.

Politician, Commander-In-Chief, father. Had an ambition to serve this great nation for 8 years.$NL;$NL;He wasn't a crook, for sure.$NL;$NL;The 37th was the only president who resigned from office. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.
tran_text: 政治家、總司令、父親。有為了國家奉獻8年的野心。$NL;$NL;他當然不是騙子。$NL;$NL;第三十七任是史上第一位在任內辭職的總統。然而在罪犯眼中，它依舊非常受歡迎。

AMMO PICKUPS ARE DISABLED FOR THIS WEAPON.
Buy the Golden Grin Casino DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買the Golden Grin Casino DLC解鎖！

orig_text: Okay, it doesn't hide your face and it is certainly not going to stop any bullets whizzing your way....but, damn. You're going to look like the belle of the ball wearing Mrs Volkov's wedding tiara.
tran_text: 好，它沒有隱藏你的面及它當然不能阻止任何子彈呼嘯地穿過你身體 .... 但，幹，你需要看起來像戴起 Mrs Volkov 嫁妝頭飾舞會的美女。

orig_text: This pilotka was found on a corpse near Lake Müritz in Germany. It was attached with a string around the poor, dead soldier's head. There were no other bodies next to unnamed fellow, and as the origin of the pilotka was russian, it's fair to assume that he stemmed from the same country. Speculations were many, none were true, but the most inspiring story was the one about a soldier so proud of the motherland that he tied his pilotka to his head before he died.
Concealable optic. Makes for quick target acquisition.
Protect your glass chin with a metal jaw.$NL;$NL;The only thing you will be chewing from now on with your jaw is law enforcers, right?
tran_text: 利用這副鋼鐵牙齒來保護你脆弱的臉頰吧。$NL;$NL;從今開始你會以這副鋼牙撕碎的就只有執法人員，對吧？
製造麻煩的越戰老兵$NL;The Troubled War Veteran

orig_text: Double barreled 12-gauge, very high powered but very low capacity.
tran_text: 雙管 12-gauge ，非常高火力但低彈藥量。

orig_text: Untrained, the Electarodent can be found nibbling sweet carrots or frolicking across Alpine meadows. However, fully trained, the Electarodent is most often found wielding Bernetti 9's and eating through the face-plates of Skulldozers.
tran_text: 未經訓練的發電老鼠會在阿爾卑斯山上叼著胡蘿蔔。然而經過全套訓練後，發電老鼠會拿著 Bernetti 9 ，咬穿重裝警察的面甲。

orig_text: In 'Buccaneers Ahoy!', these swashbuckling undead heisters terrorized the treasure-laden galleons of the Caribbean for years, proving forever that....pirates arrrrrrrrrrrr cool.
tran_text: 在「海盜 嗨！」，那些虛張聲勢的亡靈強盜恐嚇多年載著寶物的帆船，證明是永遠的 .... 海盜啊啊啊，帥啊。

orig_text: The English Longbow was the original weapon of mass destruction. Providing devastating power at range, it could end a battle before a single sword was swung.
tran_text: 英格蘭長弓是原始的殺傷性武器，提供遠程的巨大傷害，可以在敵方揮劍之前結束戰鬥。

orig_text: Knife with a poisoned tip that deals damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies
tran_text: 這把匕首塗滿了毒藥，可以造成持續的傷害並有機率打斷敵人的攻擊。

orig_text: Aubrey is a real gun lover.$NL;$NL;Large headed and long snouted Aubrey is a master of arms and knows nothing better than to kill using some fine weaponry.$NL;$NL;Pigs have pretty small lungs though so Aubrey can't run that far.
tran_text: Aubrey是真正的槍械愛好者。$NL;$NL;大頭和長鼻子的Aubrey是一位武器專家並知曉沒有任何東西能比拿著精良的武器殺戮還要更好。$NL;$NL;但是因為豬的肺非常小Aubrey沒辦法跑很遠。
Mega 卡哇伊 かわいい

orig_text: This is a Housewarming party item!
tran_text: 這是 Housewarming 派對的物品！

tran_text: Mega Dallas是原有的Dallas面具的進化版，它象徵了超級和catharsis。$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL對你敬禮！

Politician, Commander-In-Chief, father. Has an ambition to serve this great nation for 8 years. A talkative man, no doubt.$NL;$NL;The 45th is one of the most controversial presidents in history. Among criminals however, he remains extremely popular.

There is a cold fire in your heart. All those who have wronged you will pay. If you so have to burn with them in the conflagration, you will extract payment for any perceived or actual slight against your person. There is no rationality to your rage- it must simply be indulged.

The Dragon Lord became famous during the so-called Tang Rebellion in 1976, when General Tang, an opium baron, summoned his rivals to a warehouse in Taipei, and proceeded to incinerate them (and much of Taipei).
Requires the Ambidexterity perk or the Akimbo skill
tran_text: 你得具備雙槍天賦或者是技能

orig_text: "And the nominees for The Greatest Heisters In The World are....."
tran_text: 「這世上最大的搶劫被人提名在世界上 ..... 」

orig_text: The original mobster that really made the criminal way of life something to strive for. A given member of the PAYDAY crew if he were alive today. But now you can at least cosplay him, making the police scared as they think they've seen a ghost.
tran_text: 起始惡棍真的為了犯罪而努力，如果他還在世一定會是 PAYDAY 幫的人，但現在你最少能裝成他，令警察見到你時以為見到鬼。
一個可隱藏又精確的部件。

orig_text: A pilot in the Royal Air Force went down during WW2 a few miles outside Bialystok, Poland. Considered K.I.A, he was later found deep in the Bialowieza Forest where he'd survived on fish, roots and animals he managed to caught - alive and well but madness had sunk his teeth into him. He'd been forced to amputate his left leg. But still managed to survive without infections. A small hut was also found, together with salvaged parts from his aircraft. He was found in 1978.

After his brother's murder, Ikas joined an underground clan of ninjas to train and become their deadliest warrior. Ikas quickly proved himself and was put in charge of the whole American branch of the clan. His signature mask now inspires fear and respect and anyone who wears a mask like this will be seen as a brother of the Achilles Clan.
tran_text: 他的兄弟被謀殺後，Ikas加入地下的忍者組織並成為他們最致命的戰士。Ikas很快的證明自己的實力，他被負責管理組織的美國分部。現在，他的面具喚起人們的恐懼與崇拜。任何人戴上像這樣的面具會被視為Achilles Clan的兄弟。

orig_text: The pout is a facial expression that humans can make.$NL;$NL;It is a protrusion of the lips, especially as an expression of sullen discontent.$NL;$NL;Who would not be discontent, having had their horns sawed off like that.
tran_text: 撅嘴是人類的面部表情。 $NL;$NL;就是突出的嘴唇，特別是想表達不滿。 $NL;$NL;有誰不滿的話，就給他們好好順順毛。

orig_text: A simple piece of cloth tied around their heads will transform anyone, be it beggar, farmer or common man into a ninja. A shadow among shadows, a dagger in the dark. He can be fierce or stealthy and can be anyone in a crowd. He does what he sets out to do and then disappears.
tran_text: 一塊纏在頭上的簡單的布可以讓任何人，例如乞丐、農夫、或一般人變成忍者。影中之影，黑暗中的匕首。他可以很好鬥或很神秘，可以溶入人群中。他完成他的任務並消失在黑暗之中。

orig_text: Requires The Stoic perk deck equipped

It's been four years. Four years of hard work, meth cooked, shots fired and loot hauled. But we've only just began. We do feel a bit nostalgic. It's been four years since we came to Washington and took on our first heist here and now we're pros. And when it's someone's birthday, you need to get them a gift. Therefore we've poured 24k hot, luscious gold all over Chain's Mask. Happy Birthday PAYDAY 2!
A more exotic receiver. Purely aesthetic.
tran_text: 一個更有異國情調的機匣，純粹美觀。
亮藍色 / 鈷 藍色

orig_text: "Hey! Payday clowns! Vlad here with a little something from the Motherland. I wore this beautiful heavy bastard all through my days in Donetsk. It ain't pretty like your delicate American masks, but it kept me pretty!"
tran_text: 「嘿！ Payday 幫的小丑！ Vlad 在這裡有一些來自祖國的東西。我在頓涅茨克時每天都穿住這美麗重型的混蛋。它不像你們精巧的美國面具那麼美，但它保住了我的美麗！」

orig_text: The Molotov cocktail is perhaps the simplest weapon that can call itself a grenade. Nothing more than a breakable bottle of flammable liquid with a 'fuse' replaced by a burning rag. It is cheap, simple and highly effective.
tran_text: 別名「莫洛托夫雞尾酒」的汽油彈可說是構造最簡單的手榴彈：在一個玻璃瓶子裡裝滿易燃液體，再在瓶口上紮上可燃布塊作引信。成本低廉，製作簡單，卻極之有效。

orig_text: This distorted face is what ghost stories are truly made of. You linger in the shadows, torn and grim. Before you step out and scare the living daylights out of anyone that crosses your path. The knowledge of true fear is gained from looking upon this horror. That fear, that delicious, pure, crispy fear is what drives this monster. It triggers an unquenchable thirst for more. Don't look, but don't close your eyes.

A dark forest is scary to anyone, no matter how old you are. You fear whatever is in it, and the things lurking in the shadows. But you seldom think of the actual trees. You never think of Dendron. And when you do, it's already too late. Dendron strikes without mercy. So fear not what's behind the trees, but instead the trees.
tran_text: 不論你有多大，每個人都會怕一個陰暗的森林。你害怕裡面的一切事物，以及在影子裡來回遊蕩的東西。不過你很少會想到樹，你從來沒有想過 Dendron 。而當你想到的時候，已經太遲了， Dendron 下手時絕不心軟。所以不要怕躲在樹後的東西，怕樹吧。

orig_text: This modification is incompatible with your current $conflict;
tran_text: 這個修改與你現在的$conflict;不兼容

orig_text: You got a war face! AAAAAAAAHH! That's a war face, let me see your war face!$NL;$NL;...$NL;$NL;Bullshit. You didn't convince me. let me see your REAL war face!$NL;$NL;...Actually, that one's pretty good...$NL;$NL;This mask is Poetry Jam mask. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 你獲得了挑釁之面！啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！那是個能挑起戰爭的臉，讓我看看你的挑釁之面$NL;$NL;...$NL;$NL;胡說。你說服不了我。讓我看看你的真正挑釁之面$NL;$NL;...實際上，那個效果不錯...$NL;$NL;這是一個Poetry Jam面具。它不能在PAYDAY裡掉落並且不能被出售。取而代之，它可以免費返回你的面具倉庫，但任何花費的任何自定義塗裝將會丟失。

orig_text: Buy The Bomb Heists DLC to unlock
tran_text: 購買 the The Bomb Heists DLC 來解鎖

orig_text: To use the Sentry Gun, you need to place it by holding $BTN_USE_ITEM;. Upon deployment it will use up 30% of your weapons' total ammo. It can be destroyed by firing at it, but as long as it is not completely destroyed, picking it up will automatically repair it and return the remaining Sentry Gun ammo. As it runs out of ammo it will stop firing but it can be reloaded by re-deploying it after pick up.$NL;$NL;The Sentry Gun automatically aims and fires at targets that are detected by its sensors. It's commonly used as a distraction, drawing attention from you and your team.
tran_text: 自動步哨槍是一台能偵測目標，瞄準及射擊敵對目標的便攜式炮台。一直以來，軍用步哨槍用於偵測並擊破短距離來襲的導彈及敵方戰機。$NL;$NL;要使用步哨槍，你要先按住$BTN_USE_ITEM;鍵來設置於地上，步哨槍設置後就不能再被移動。步哨槍能被敵人的攻擊所摧毀。一旦步哨槍用光了子彈，即會停止運作。

orig_text: Commander Wasp sat on incredible technical capacity. Strength and intelligence was by far superior to the other side. A prototype that would have the needed circuits to outsmart the opposing forces. But an untested prototype. Something rushed. Something that was too experimental. Madness strikes circuit boards, but we refer to it as a "bug". Killing his fellow troops in a rage of paranoia - Commander Wasp became a criminal of war.

These shades belonged to a colleague of John's that he was hired to kill.$NL;$NL;It started like any other night. Only this night, he got a contract to kill another contract killer who was making rounds that day. John knew he had five stops to make and was using the same taxi cab between all of them.$NL;$NL;In the end, he didn't even need to do the deed himself - he was already dead when he found him.
tran_text: 這副墨鏡原本屬於 John 受僱刺殺的一位同行。$NL;$NL;那是尋常的一夜。只是這夜，他接了一份合約要殺死另一名當天執行工作的職業殺手。John 知道他有五個目的地，並且會乘坐同一輛的士。 $NL;$NL;結果到最後，他甚至都沒有出手——目標被發現的時候已經死了。

orig_text: You need $money; more to buy this.
tran_text: 你的錢不夠，再去賺$money;才能買這個。

orig_text: A classic made into a mask. The standard 52-card deck is the most played deck of playing cards used today, and regardless if you are a rookie or professional player, you will most likely recognize this face. A proper poker face-mask.
tran_text: 將經典製作成面具。標準的五十二張撲克牌是現時最常使用的遊戲牌牌具，不論你是新手還是專業玩家，你都一定認得出這副臉孔。正宗的撲克臉面具。

orig_text: Our two handed great ruler is the biggest ruler we make. But don't let its size fool you, as there's nothing awkward or clumsy about this awesome ruler.
Buy the Dead by Daylight Deluxe Game to unlock
tran_text: 購買 Dead By Daylight Deluxe 以解鎖

orig_text: Forged from Penrose patterned rapidly quenched metallic alloys, this helmet was constructed from debris recovered from a top secret crash site. The government continues to deny any knowledge of its existence.
tran_text: 用彭羅斯平舖模型去鍛造並快速冷卻所製成，這個頭盔是由一個政府最高機密爆破地點中的一片碎片來作為材料的。政府將會持續否認任何有關於其存在的一切消息。

orig_text: Buy the Gage Russian Weapon Pack DLC to unlock

Mounting the prow of Viking ships, the dragon head was used to scare off sea monsters and evil spirits. Dozers and Cloakers are evil, right? Why not give it a go and see if it can scare them away? But have your gun ready just in case. For safety.
tran_text: 安裝維京人的船頭，龍頭用來嚇走海怪及惡魔靈魂。 Dozers 及 Cloakers 是惡魔，對吧？為何不給它一個機會去試試它能不能嚇到他們？但你的槍需要準備好。確保安全。

orig_text: Use an Aldstone's Heritage Event DLC code to unlock

A once great actor who claimed to have become possessed by a demonic spirit started to wear a mask to hide his deformed appearance. The mask one day broke and what was hiding underneath could never be sealed again.
tran_text: 一個很好的演員聲稱他被惡魔靈魂所附身，開始了戴面具去隱藏他變形的外觀。這面具有天被破壞，被隱藏的事都不能再收好了。

orig_text: Unable to sell last weapon in inventory!
tran_text: 不能售賣你最後一把武器！

orig_text: Alfred the Carnotaurus was a very fast dinosaur when he was alive and kicking. His distinctive horns and his muscular neck made him stand out next to all the other dinosaurs. His large head along with his horns working as shock absorbers made him particularly skilled at head butting other dinosaurs in order to show who had the largest prehistoric d-peen.
tran_text: 牛龍，當他還活蹦亂跳的時候，是一隻移動非常迅速的恐龍。他獨特的角以及他頸部的肌肉使他在所有恐龍之中顯得與眾不同。他巨大的頭顱以及他的角可以用來吸收衝撞時所造成的傷害，這讓他在與其他恐龍用頭部撞擊時佔了很大的優勢，為了展現誰才是最大的史前恐龍榔頭

orig_text: Mad as March Hare. As they stare into your crazed yellow eyes, they'd better hand the cash over quick. Then take the money and run. No one outruns a hare.
Improves stability but gives slightly less concealment.
tran_text: 增加穩定性但降低少量隱匿度。

orig_text: This mask was originally designed to be part of a complete head-to-toe heisting outfit. However, field testing revealed that the gaudy spandex suit offered no protection against bullets, knives or grenades. The mask, however, was found to be lightweight, durable and stylish. It's heistin' time!
tran_text: 這個面具本來是一身從頭到腳的搶劫裝束的一部分。然而，這套花哨的纖維制服裝對子彈，刀具和手雷完全沒有抵抗力。而這個面具卻是輕巧耐用又有型。搶劫時間到了！

orig_text: Agile as a Cat, and lucky as one too, you will dare any heist and successfully breach any defenses. When the shit hits the fan, you will always dodge and land on your feet. There is no better way to spend your nine lives - a stone-cold killer is what you are and everyone knows it.
Such mask. Much disguise. Very robber.
tran_text: 這麼個面具，諸多偽裝，很像強盜。

orig_text: Completely removed the stock for excellent concealment.

tran_text: 彈夾容量 $clip;, 總備彈量 $max;

orig_text: Download the free Sweet Tooth DLC to unlock
tran_text: 下載免費的Sweet Tooth DLC 來解鎖

orig_text: This Ghost mask looks like it's from the future and it might as well be.$NL;$NL;Full head protection, made out of carbon fiber and genetically engineered spider-silk. People might even mistake you for a high-end Moto GP rider.$NL;$NL;Last mistake they'll make.$NL;$NL;This mask is an Infamy tree reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any pattern, color or material as well as the customization fee to put these together will be lost.
tran_text: 這個幽靈的轉生面具看起來就像來自未來，或者，它真的就來自未來。$NL;$NL;全罩式的安全保護，用碳纖維以及基因工程技術造出的特殊蜘蛛絲所製成。人們甚至可能會把你誤會成是一個職業級Moto GP選手。$NL;$NL;不過，這也只會是他們臨終前最後的一次誤會了。$NL;$NL;這面具是惡名的獎勵。它無法從任務結算中取得，也不能被販售。但是，它可以免費被收回到你的面具收藏中，不過，不管是樣式、顏色或是材質這些需要客製化的東西仍需要花費的。

orig_text: Buy the Sokol Character Pack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買 Sokol 角色包 DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: Medium movement penalty, medium visibility.$NL;$NL;The flak jacket by Gensec Security Industries is a modern take on the classic version. It absorbs the impact from firearm projectiles and shrapnel from explosions.$NL;$NL;It combines a heavy ballistic vest with shoulder and side protection armor components, offering spine protection as well.$NL;$NL;Flak jackets are worn by Marines, combat soldiers and Gensec FTSU task forces.
tran_text: 中型移動懲罰，中可見度。$NL;$NL;由GenSec保安工廠所研究的防彈外套是新潮標準版本。這吸收了槍械彈幕及爆炸碎片影響。$NL;$NL;這合成了重型防彈背心與肩膀和側面保護裝甲部件，提供了脊椎保護。$NL;$NL;防彈外套常被海軍陸戰隊、戰鬥軍人、GenSec FTSU任務力量所採用。

orig_text: A strange thing, the human skull. It's both simple and beautiful. Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if it's only partially shown. The human brain even has a special region for it.$NL;$NL;You finished all heists on the Normal difficulty? What are you, some kind of gangster? Maybe this mask will suit you after all.
Buy The Wolf Pack DLC to unlock
tran_text: 買 Wolf Pack DLC 以解鎖

orig_text: John Herbert Dillinger was a famous American bank robber.$NL;$NL;His gang robbed two dozen banks and even four police stations.$NL;$NL;Dillinger himself escaped jail twice and was widely known as one of the meanest motherfuckers in the depression-era United States.
tran_text: 約翰．赫伯特．迪林傑是美國知名的銀行搶匪。$NL;$NL;他與同夥涉及至少24家銀行和4家警察局的搶劫。$NL;$NL;迪林傑自己更曾兩度越獄成功，其事跡更被譽為三十年代大蕭條時期的都會傳奇之一。

orig_text: This is the mask of someone who has a lot on his mind.$NL;$NL;Putting on this mask sparks an excessive, almost explosive desire to learn more about crimes and how to commit them.
tran_text: 這是思想豐富的人的面具。$NL;$NL;戴上這個面具能引發大量的，近乎爆炸性的，對犯罪的學習欲與如何執行它們的方法。

orig_text: Your stash is out of masks.
Complete the fourth riddle on the Locke & Load Event website to earn this mod.
It's modern, dynamic and a real crowd-pleaser. It's sleek, slick and totally stylish. It's both the music of Le Castle Vania, and his mask.
tran_text: 很現代、很有活力、很光滑、又很能帶給歡笑並完全時尚卻華而不實。伴隨著Le Castle Vania音樂的面具。

orig_text: Every heisters and law enforcers favorite weapon for crowd control and dispersal of non-compliant people. The advantages of a expandable baton over a fixed baton are numerous. Lightweight and effective, more versatile and looks more intimidating to any potential aggressor.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 每一位搶匪和警察在控制人群和驅逐不合作人士時都喜歡使用的武器。伸縮警棍比傳統警棍有著更多的優點：重量更輕、更好揮動、用途更廣，對任何潛在的侵略者有更好的阻嚇力。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: You'll never lose your keys again!

The origin of the Metalhead is unclear.$NL;$NL;It looks more of a helmet than a mask. It has spikes pointing out of it and looks very much like a pimped out gas mask made of iron. It's unclear if it protects the wearer from any gas or melee weapons however.$NL;$NL;It looks pretty rad though.$NL;$NL;This mask is Poetry Jam mask. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any customization and the fee to put that together will be lost.
tran_text: 金屬頭的出處不詳。$NL;$NL;比起面具它更像一頂頭盔。面具上長滿尖刺，活像皮條客用的鐵製防毒面具。但不清楚能否有效保護戴上者免於各種毒氣和近身攻擊的傷害。$NL;$NL;這是 Poetry Jam 活動的面具。它不能在PAYDAY中獲得，也不能賣它。然而，你可以將面具退回面具倉庫裡，但是所有客製和組裝的費用不會退回。

orig_text: Every ship come bearing tales of ghost. Restless phantoms seen by tired spotters late at night. Everything from Krakens to mermaids. But the tale of Keelhauled Alex is maybe one of the most feared. Alex had been stealing food during a long sail out at sea. As he was caught, he was sentenced to be keelhauled. Not a serious crime, but a serious punishment. But as Alex was beneath the boat, another ship opened fire, and Alex was abandoned and forgotten on the bottom of the ship. As the dust settled, his corpse was thrown into the depths. But ever since then, Keelhauled Alex walks ships at night, staring down everyone from captains to simple deck hands. It is said that he can gaze into your soul and devour it.

Somewhere, deep in the oceanic darkness dwells our lord and savior, Chtulhu. Praise be to Him who spares us His giant wrath and blesses us with His mind controlling tenderness. Don't eat squids or eternal damnation is yours.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: 在某處，深在海洋的黑暗處住了我們的主及救主克蘇魯。他分享了他的巨大憤怒給我們及用控制柔情來祝福我們，所以讚美他。不要吃烏賊或你面對永恆的詛咒。$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL 向你致敬！

orig_text: Everyone loves a good pair of sunglasses.$NL;$NL;But only the cockiest, most wanted, cops be damned sons of bitches are crazy enough to rob a goddamn bank wearing 'em.$NL;$NL;That's you.$NL;$NL;This mask is an Infamy tree reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any pattern, color or material as well as the customization fee to put these together will be lost.
tran_text: 每個人都愛一副好的墨鏡。$NL;$NL;但只有鬧事鬼，通緝犯，那狗娘養的警察才會瘋到帶上它去搶那天殺的銀行。$NL;$NL;就是你。$NL;$NL;這個面具是惡名樹的獎勵。它不能在PAYDAY中丟棄，也不能販賣。反而，它能免費回到你的面具倉庫，但任何圖案、顏色、材料甚至個人化費用都不會退回。

orig_text: Considered the "father of modernized crime". Not clear why he's nicknamed "Lucky", but he managed to get arrested 25 times and never spent a day in jail. And he survived a throat slashing as he refused to join another mob. Either way, a true inspiration.

If you received a dollar every time the Butcher was called a "witch", a "harlot" or a "banshee" by her peers you could earn enough money to buy the entirety of Croatia. Cynical men around her bemoaned the fact that she was female, and felt endangered and distressed at the sight of her meteoric rise in the criminal underground. Keep in mind that the Balkans are not exactly known for their capacity to tolerate anybody who is in any way different, and one can only image the flat-out chauvinism and misogyny she must have dealt with while working with some of the most ruthless criminals every day of her existence. This mask shows how she is seen by both her rivals and her associates. It makes people feel afraid. As they should be.
tran_text: 如果每次屠夫被同行稱呼作「女巫」「妓女」和「女妖」時你都能獲得一美元，你現在就能買下整個克羅地亞了。她身邊的男性同行都慨嘆她是位女性，又為她在犯罪世界中的迅速崛起而感到惴惴不安。始終要記得巴爾幹半島並非包容萬象之地，你可以想像她過著與無情罪犯們打交道的每一天，都得同時應付那些明擺著的沙文主義和厭女主義。這張面具表示了她在對手和聯繫人心中的形象。它讓人們感到害怕。他們本就該如此。

orig_text: Back in the Vietnam war there was this big-muscled guy who went nuts and started to use a bow instead of modern weapons. It didn't end well.
tran_text: Gage弄這個越戰老兵面具可花了好一段日子。在越戰的時候Gage遇上一名滿身肌肉的狀漢，他可瘋得寧願用弓箭也不用現代武器來殺敵。$NL;$NL;雖然那瘋漢早在戰爭初期就死了，但Gage就是至今一直對他念念不忘。

orig_text: With a background like the one Dragan has, there's no surprise he aspires to greatness in the criminal underworld.$NL;$NL;His mask represents a lot of his own characteristics, with the clear resemblance to some of the original crew's masks that tells of his ability to infiltrate and blend in while still having some features that tells of his unending ruthlessness.$NL;$NL;The Croatian checker on the forehead serves as a reminder for both himself and his enemies to be aware that he is not your common western street thug.
tran_text: 以Dragan的背景，不難想像他在地下世界打混是多麼得心應手。$NL;$NL;他的面具代表著他多個人格特質，它與好幾個PAYDAY幫始創成員面具有著共同之處以顯示他作為卧底的能力，同時具有突顯他殘忍無道一面的特徵。$NL;$NL;額頭上的克羅地亞紅白方格提醒Dragan和他的敵人：自己並非尋常的西歐小混混。

orig_text: This is the Champ mask. Based on a bad day for Dallas. How bad? Well, imagine being on the business end of thirteen rounds with a professional boxer. Swollen brow, broken nose, fat lip, black eye, contusions, concussions, dislocated jaw - you name it, and this mask has it. Yeah, a really bad day for Dallas.
tran_text: 這是一個屬於冠軍的面具。源自於Dallas某個很慘的一天，怎麼說？試著想想，當你在一次工作中擊敗了一名職業拳擊手，腫脹的額頭、被打歪的鼻子、腫起的嘴唇、黑眼圈、嚴重的挫傷、瘀青以及脫臼的下顎，只要你說得出來的，這面具都有。這一定是Dallas人生中最慘的一天。

orig_text: This armor can be earned in the ##Crime Spree## gamemode.
Fight global warming with a mighty roar while wearing this magnificent face covering.
Perform $progress; more double kills with one bullet using this weapon
Buy the Dragan Character Pack DLC to unlock!
tran_text: 購買Dragan Character Pack DLC 來解鎖！

orig_text: There needs to be a harsh statement made about the rotting corruption penetrating every sinew of today's society. The self-deception, the scrambling for a false sense of a security. But you're not safe, not now and not ever. The American Dream is a brutally scarred nightmare disguised to lead poor souls astray. Take what you need; grab your future by the throat and force down your ambition until it chokes on it. Mark where you tread with the bodies you leave in your wake.
This classic piece boosts accuracy, stability but affects suppression.
tran_text: 這經典部件大幅增加精確度、穩定性但影響威脅度。

orig_text: This mask is made of strange materials, holding it feels awkward. Wearing it feels even stranger.$NL;$NL;Putting on the mask, you feel like an outsider, a foreigner, someone who constantly changes locations, staying away, not wanting to be recognized by anyone.
tran_text: 該面具用奇怪的材料製作而成，感覺很笨拙。戴起來甚至感覺像是陌生人。 $NL;$NL;戴上該面具，你會感覺像個局外人，外國人，不斷改變位置，遠離他人，不希望被人認識的人。

orig_text: Worried about getting shot in the face with a high powered firearm?$NL;$NL;Scared that you will get stomped by a bulldozer, cloaker and a shield at the same time?$NL;$NL;Wearing this mask will not help you, but you will get downed in style. The Bullet - out in Black Markets near you, right now!
tran_text: 擔心被強大火力爆頭嗎？$NL;$NL;害怕同時被bulldozer、cloaker和shield採在腳下嗎？$NL;$NL;戴上這面具雖然不能幫你，但能讓你倒下時更加有型。The Bullet，現在在黑市販售，請即選購！

orig_text: Drop one of these and you'll vanish in a cloud of smoke, leaving your enemies struggling to take aim at you. Dodging bullets is a piece of cake when they can't see you properly.

With the rage of a fearsome volcano, the hostile Hothead lights up the night with blazing speed! What ignites his frenzied flame? From what does the raging bull run? Very few have caught up close enough to ask, and even fewer have gotten a coherent response!
tran_text: 當那嚇人火山猛烈地噴發時，敵方的Hothead以點火般的速度點亮了夜晚！是什麼點燃了他那瘋狂的怒火？是什麼讓這頭憤怒的公牛狂奔？很少人能靠近並詢問他，甚至幾乎沒有人能得到一個合理的回應。

orig_text: Feeder has dislodged his jaw with one sole purpose: to be able to swallow a whole, human heart. This explains why his teeth and tongue is of no use, as chewing is not important. When he roams the night he seeks out teens with strong hearts that can sustain him. So if you spot a corpse with a ripped chest - run.
tran_text: Feeder 讓他的下巴移位只為了一個目的：好能吞下一整顆人類心臟。這也解釋了為什麼他的牙齒跟舌頭沒有什麼用處，因為根本就不需要咀嚼。當他在夜晚遊蕩時，他會尋找心臟強壯的青少年好能讓他維持生命。所以如果你看到一個被開膛的屍體的話－－跑吧。

orig_text: This is a clean version of Sokol's iconic mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Sokol面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Frank is a monster, but he is - contrary to popular belief - a sensitive, emotional creature whose only aim is to share his life with another monster.$NL;$NL;However, he realized from the moment of his "birth" that even his own creator cannot stand being around him. Knowing this, Frank decided to become a bank robber instead. The end.
tran_text: 科學怪人是個怪物，但他其實跟一般所熟知的敏感而情緒化且生命中唯一的目標是向其他怪物分享他的生活的那個怪物剛好相反。然而，他發現了就連在他「誕生」的那一刻，他的製造者也沒在他身邊。知道了這些事後，科學怪人決定要成為一名銀行搶匪。劇終。

orig_text: This drill can open a Completely OVERKILL Safe
tran_text: 此鑽機能打開一個 Completely OVERKILL 保險箱

orig_text: Brutish, aggressive and generally repulsive, the orcs have always been a hated race. Orcs are larger and stronger than their goblin cousins but smaller and less powerful than their ogre brethren. This particular purple-skinned orc came from the Stonetremble clan who were known for their fierce warriors and overpowered, hybrid shamans.
tran_text: 半獸人野蠻好鬥而令人反感，一直是個被憎恨的種族。半獸人比他們的哥布林表親更大更強壯，但是還比不上他們的食人魔兄弟。這個特別的紫色皮膚半獸人來自石顫部落，其以凶猛的戰士與強大的混血薩滿而聞名。

orig_text: Solving logic puzzles as a brain teaser is a great way to unwind after some intense criminal activity. Hoxton likes games that lets him wrap his head around a problem and figure it out one step at a time with the clues given.

The goat doesn't get much respect in the animal kingdom, and often find themselves to be mocked by the other animals - but that works perfectly in their favor. Putting on this foolish mask might give you the same advantage and make the cops underestimate you.
tran_text: 在動物界中，羊沒有得到太多尊重，及常常發現被其他動物嘲笑－但那工作對它們十分有利。戴上這傻乎乎的面具可能會給你相同的好處及令條子低估了你。

orig_text: "Lycanwulf, Lycanwulf!" they yelled, the frightened villagers, as they laid eyes upon this abomination known as the Lycanwulf. The petty humans were now prisoners of the beast, in a prison without walls, ceilings or a key, where the only escape was death.
tran_text: 「狼人！狼人！」嚇壞了的村民尖叫著，因為他們親眼目睹了名為人狼的怪異。英俊小生被困於妖獸之身，此牢獄無牆無窗亦無門，唯一出路只有死。

orig_text: Don the mask, become anonymous and do as you wish.$NL;$NL;Do it because you mean it, do it because you were told to, or do it for the lulz.$NL;$NL;Do all the things that regular society will not allow you. Like robbing a bank.
tran_text: 戴上面具，變成無名小卒做你想做的事。$NL;$NL;因為想做就做、被要求而做或是沒有理由而做。$NL;$NL;做那些社會無法容忍你的事，例如去搶銀行。

orig_text: The Krieger Blade is the standard knife of the German Army. Great grip, and the Tanto blade makes it an excellent choice for combat.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 克里格刀是德軍的標準匕首。大握柄的短刀，進戰首選。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: You are unbreakable. The ship is filling with water, but you refuse to move. Such are your principles that you would rather go into the deep with a failing institution than admit your folly and admit yourself as fallible as your peers. Justice is what you deem it to be, and damned be those who would oppose your righteous wisdom.
You need $money; more to craft this modification.
tran_text: 你需要再多$money;現金才能進行這次修改。

orig_text: Exploring the Pacific "Ring of Fire" in his youth, Bodhi came to the following revelation: honoring oneself means honoring the myths. A myth that stuck with him was that of Maui. Like Bodhi, Maui was a dauntless champion of humankind, a trickster and adventurer.
tran_text: 從他的口中說出和平的「火環」， Bodhi 帶來了啟示：表彰一個人代表表彰迷思。一個迷思卡住了他有關茂宜的事。就像 Bodhi ，茂宜是人類中勇敢的冠軍、騙子及冒險家。

orig_text: An item for the sole use of pulling currency in? Perfect for you heisters! Show those pesky cops exactly why the house always wins.

The identity of the first horseman of the Apocalypse, and exactly what he represents is something still greatly debated to this day. Some call him Conquest, some say he was Christ himself, and some claim he was even the Antichrist.
Commonly used for settling the score between two New York teenage street gangs in the fifties. You can even sing along.
An ergonomic grip which adds stability.
tran_text: 增加穩定性的舒適握把。

orig_text: Complete the ENTRAPMENT achievement to unlock
tran_text: 完成 ENTRAPMENT 成就以解鎖

orig_text: Join the PAYDAY 2 Official Community Group on Steam to unlock!

Like the rat, Richter is a silent killer. It can make its way into just about anywhere - into the most secure banks and apartments. It can avoid detection when it wants, and, once there, spread death like a plague. It kills without remorse. Nothing personal.
tran_text: 像老鼠一樣，Richter是一位無聲的殺手。它可以設法進入任何地方——包括大部分銀行與公寓。它可以隨時躲避偵測，到達目的地後像瘟疫一樣傳播死亡。它的殺戮不帶一絲個人感情。

orig_text: Santa, more known as Santa Claus, Saint Nicholas, Father Christmas and Kris Kringle (?) is a man of epic proportions. Words like legendary, mythical, historical and folkloric best describe this beast of a man.$NL;$NL;This particular mask is the Happy Santa mask. Big smile and super jolly with red cheeks and all, wearing this you'll even bring the most negative of Bulldozers into a joyous smile.
tran_text: 聖誕老人，或稱之為桑塔克勞斯，聖尼古拉斯，聖誕之父和克里斯克林格（？），是位百年難遇的人。 就像傳說，神話，歷史和民俗所描述的這個野獸般的聖人。 $NL;$NL;此特別的面具是快樂聖誕老人面具。 大大的笑容和超愉快的紅臉頰，還加上，戴上這個面具後你將給最悲觀的Bulldozers（堆土機們）帶來歡樂的笑容！

orig_text: There's no such thing as a good snake, but even among the deadly serpents the cobra is bad news. The broad hood, when seen, is a display of threat - so run. Its long fangs can pierce elephant skin - so run. And just a drop of its venom can fell a dozer - so... look, basically, when you see this, just run. Because they also spit.
tran_text: 從來就沒有好的蛇，但在眾多致命蛇種當中眼鏡蛇也是毒中之毒。當你看到牠擴大頸部，那是威嚇－－所以逃吧。牠的尖長毒牙連大象的厚皮也能刺穿－－所以逃吧。牠的毒液只需一滴就能做掉一個 Bulldozer－－所以......基本上，當你遇上牠，逃吧。因為牠們還能口噴毒液呢。

orig_text: Requires the PAYDAY 2: Alienware Alpha Mauler Pack to unlock!
tran_text: 需要 PAYDAY 2: Alienware Alpha Mauler Pack 來解鎖!

orig_text: Historically used as a general purpose tool, for throwing at people and the occasional hand-to-hand melee. A weapon with which almost any crook can attain some degree of proficiency. Only through proper heisting can one begin to realize the full potential of the tomahawk as both a tool and weapon. But mostly weapon.$NL;$NL;This weapon can be charged to deal more damage by holding the melee button.
tran_text: 歷史悠久的戰斧既是多用途工具，也很適合用作投擲武器和格鬥武器。對新手惡棍來說輕易上手，只有專業匪徒才能精通它作為工具來使用－－但更多時還是武器一把。$NL;$NL;本武器可按住近戰攻擊鍵進行儲力來增加傷害。

orig_text: This is a clean version of Jiro's iconic mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Jiro面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: Legend speaks of an entity so malevolent it tried to smash the Moon into the Earth. Though defeated by four masked warriors, the entity escaped and inhabited... something. We hope it will never return, but remember: sometimes the man wears the mask, and sometimes the mask wears the man.
tran_text: 相傳一名邪惡之物曾試圖想將月球墜落地球。雖然祂被四名面具戰士打倒，但祂成功逃脫並潛藏於......某件物事之中。我們希望祂永遠不再出現，但記住：有時是人戴上面具，但有時是面具戴在人頭上。

orig_text: In 'Xenogogs', these creatures embodied fear itself, as it tore its way from the butt of Troy Templeton during that scene.
tran_text: 在「 Xenogogs 」，這些生物中含有恐懼，他這一幕撕毀了  Troy Templeton 的屁股。

orig_text: This drill can open a Jimmy Safe
The Funnyman knows how to make people laugh. The Funnyman might go too far and take a hit or two. Beware though, because a person who can control others laughter knows how to get the last laugh.
tran_text: 笑星懂得讓人開懷大笑。當然有時候開玩笑過頭會被人打上兩拳。但記住，一個知道怎麼控制他人笑的人會笑到最後。
女性歌迷面具$NL;Female Concert Goer
