orig_text: One of the most brutal and ruthless pirates to ever exist. But also one of the most unknown. Just the way Schneider wanted it. Instead, Schneider's moniker "the Devil" was much more well known. He found it more profitable if nobody actually knew his face. But tales of how the "devil" sailed the seven seas traveled among bars in the Caribbean. To "spot the Devil on the horizon" was a common saying when someone had disappeared out at sea. But the truth was that Schneider had forever buried them in a watery grave.

"Senpai Noticed Me!!! :3"$NL;$NL;A big thank you to community member Far2close for making a hilarious version of an otherwise intimidating dozer face plate.$NL;$NL;This mask can only be obtained from a code accompanying the PAYDAY 2 DOZER BOBBLEHEAD bought from the online OVERKILL merchandise store.
tran_text: 「前輩看下我啦!!! :3」$NL;$NL;首先感謝社區成員Far2close製作的一款Dozer Mod，讓原本駭人的Dozer面甲變得很萌。$NL;$NL;這個面具只能通過OVERKILL在線周邊商城購買PAYDAY 2 Dozer Bobblehead獲得的密匙來解鎖。
來自地獄的屠夫$NL;The Butcher from Hell

orig_text: There are many rumours about the mad butcher from the east, one of them tells of a man who found such pleasure in butchering pigs that he slowly started to look like one.$NL;$NL;Working in a butchery as hot as hell itself his skin became disfigured with blisters and cuts, people tell of screams coming from inside... And not just the screams of pigs.
tran_text: 最近有很多傳言，是關於一個來自東方的瘋子屠夫。其中一個是這樣說的，有個以宰殺豬隻為樂的男人開始慢慢地變成了他所宰殺的對象───豬。$NL;$NL;然而，在屠宰場這種像地獄般炎熱的地方，男人的皮膚開始長出了許多的水泡及傷口。人們說總會聽到慘叫聲從傷口上傳來......不只是豬的慘叫聲。

orig_text: Equipping this mask slot will make you wear your preferred character's mask.
tran_text: 裝備這個面具會令你帶上你比較喜歡的角色面具。

orig_text: Whether you're a line cook flipping patties at a roadside diner, or an itamae dissecting toadfish at a $1000-a-table joint, this hat means one thing: you're the chef.
tran_text: 無論你是在街邊擺攤，還是在高檔餐廳處理魚生，這頂帽子只代表這一件事：你是個大廚。

orig_text: Politician, prize winner, owner of many medals and the first honorary citizen of the United States of America. By some it was said that he had a flawed character, saying; "never had people admired and despised a man simultaneously to the same extent; never had such opposite extremes been combined in the same human being."
tran_text: 政治家，得獎者，獲得了無數獎章以及美國第一名榮譽市民。某些人認為他在性格上有缺陷，「從未有人能夠讓人又愛又恨，也從未有人能把這兩種品格同時展現在一起。」

orig_text: Commander Crime is an American fictional character, a supervillain and the supreme leader of the criminal network C.R.I.M.E. who appears in comic books by OVERKILL Comics.$NL;$NL;The character was created by now world renowned writer-editor-artist and professional badminton player Max Elmberg Sjöholm.$NL;$NL;Commander Crime made his first appearance in The Amazing Career Criminals: The PAYDAY gang gets a C.R.I.M.E. offer they can't refuse!
tran_text: 罪惡隊長是出現在美國 OVERKILL 漫畫的虛構超級壞蛋，他是犯罪網絡組織 C.R.I.M.E. 的最高領導人。$NL;$NL;由現時世界知名的漫畫家、編輯，編劇以及職業羽毛球手 Max Elmberg Sjöholm 創作。$NL;$NL;罪惡隊長首次出現於《驚奇職業罪犯#1：PAYDAY 幫無法推辭！來自 C.R.I.M.E. 的委託》一書中。

orig_text: This blister stricken creature is the embodiment of true terror. All your childhood fears poured into something unfathomable and horrendous. Question is if you will even need bullets anymore.
tran_text: 這個滿臉水泡的生物是恐懼的真實體現。所有你童年時的恐懼都被放進這個既嚇人又摸不著邊的東西裡面，問題是你搞不好再也不需要子彈了。

orig_text: For much between 1940-1969, the Constable was the dominant military and political leader of France. Refusing to accept his government's armistice with the German invaders in 1940, he set up his base in London, proclaimed himself the incarnation of France, and created the Free French movement. During the war he rallied the overseas colonies, especially those in Africa, organized the Resistance from abroad, and struggled to gain full recognition from the British and Americans.
tran_text: 在差不多1940~1969，這30年間，Constable是法國相當有權勢的軍方及政治領導者。當他拒絕了當時法國政府與德國的入侵者在1940所訂下的停戰協定，他回到了倫敦，並建造了自己的堡壘。同時也向人民所宣布了，他才是法國主權的化身，並發起了解放法國運動。戰爭期間，他召集了許多在海外殖民地的人民，特別是那些在非洲的殖民地，創立了海外的反抗組職，並努力地向英國以及美國爭取對方的認可。

orig_text: To commemorate the day PAYDAY became the most played co-op game in a single day - 10th of June 2017. Some 221k heisters per hour were robbing banks together in style. Earning us the Top 5 Position among Most Played Games in a day of all time - PAYDAY leaves its golden mark on history. Dallas is pleased.

Life's not all about speed and running! With his livelihood destroyed from a speedy accident, he became the hero that New Rush City truly deserves. Falcon vows to take down SpeedRunner and get the city back. Is Falcon the only one sane in a world gone mad- or is he a man in a chicken suit?
tran_text: 人生的意義並不是只有速度和跑步。當他的生活被一場超速造成的車禍所摧毀，他就變成了New Rush市的大英雄。Falcon誓言要把SpeedRunner打敗，並將這座城市搶回來。到底Falcon是這瘋狂世界中唯一一個正常人，亦或是，他只是個穿著公雞裝的男人？

orig_text: Something about this mask radiates a playful malice and most who gaze upon it immediately feel a sense of unease, which is just the kind of thing you need when you're robbing a bank!

No one can stop the Red Machine! It's fast, ice-cold and merciless. With swift moves, lightning strikes and flawless tactics it humiliates the opposition, leaving them crying in desperation. Just like the Payday Gang.

A classic hockey mask.$NL;$NL;A guy told me one time...$NL;$NL;"Don't let yourself get attached to anything you are not willing to walk out on in 30 seconds flat if you feel the heat around the corner."
tran_text: 一個經典的曲棍球面具。$NL;$NL;有位老兄曾經告訴我......$NL;$NL;「如果你的直覺告訴你將要面臨危機，你要立刻停止一切行動，並在三十秒內離開現場。」

orig_text: Jimmy hasn't really made that many masks before he made his signature mask - and it shows. His mask design captures his free spirit and his disregard to things as appearance, planning and such. Good is good enough for Jimmy, he doesn't get stuck on details and wants to move forward at all times.
tran_text: Jimmy 在完成他的專屬面具前沒有弄這麼多面具的－及它的象徵。他的面具設計表達了他自由的靈魂及樣藐視不同事物的外貌、計劃等等。對 Jimmy 而言已足夠好了，他沒有集中在細節及任何時候都想向前衝。

orig_text: Inspired by the immensely popular anime  Zero 68, this mask is modeled after the helmet of the cyborg-ninja hero of the show.
tran_text: 非常受地著名漫畫 Zero 68 所影響，這面具是仿照サイボーグ忍者的頭盔。

orig_text: The skull is Death, Sangres' faithful companion throughout his career. The gold tooth is the coin that has been paid. The kill counter represents his past as a hitman, the blood-red ruby the new wealth he's seeking in the US. Sangres' name speaks of the many bloody episodes in his life, and that red blood is also present on his mask.

The Watchers are a species of extraterrestrials that act as spies on planet Earth. They communicate by using their minds and use their large eyes to witness, gather and share information about humankind, preparing themselves for the coming invasion.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: Watchers 是一種在地球上當間諜的外星生物。他們透過心電感應來互相溝通，並用他們的大眼睛來記錄、蒐集並分享有關人類的資訊，為接下來的入侵作準備。$NL;$NL;謝謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL 向你致敬！

orig_text: When Santa is flying through December skies, someone has to stay home and keep the elves in line. No-one does that better than the whip-cracking, cigar-smoking kommandant of the Claus household.
tran_text: 當聖誕老人飛過十二月的天空時，有人要在家裡保持好精靈們的紀律。最適合的人選就是揮舞長鞭，抽著雪茄的聖誕老人家務指揮官。

orig_text: This is a clean version of the iconic Hoxton Reborn mask, before it was painted.$NL;$NL;Never liked how the original one turned out? This is your chance to change history.
tran_text: 這是Hoxton 重生面具的原型，還沒塗上任何顏色。$NL;$NL;不喜歡原本的樣子？現在是你改變歷史的時候了。

orig_text: The mask of a stranger in a strange land.$NL;$NL;Masks like these were used in a lost civilization, in war, on soldiers; ceremonially, for burial rites and for shamanistic ceremonies to drive away evil spirits.
tran_text: 一個陌生土地上的陌生人面具。 $NL;$NL;這些面具被用在失落文明，戰爭，士兵，禮儀，喪葬儀式和薩滿教儀式中，目的是為了趕走邪靈。

orig_text: Based on the crazed leader of the League of Darkness. It's unclear if this was a breathing apparatus or a vocabulator. Some speculate that it was a delivery system, designed to provide Nemesis with the narcotics that gave him both his superhuman strength and psychotic rage.
tran_text: 基於黑暗聯盟的瘋狂領袖。不清楚這是個呼吸裝置還是字符機。有人推測這是個運送系統，為了向復仇邪神提供他的超級力量與瘋子般的狂怒。

orig_text: Jean-Claude the Panda used to be really cool and star in all sorts of crazy stuff.$NL;$NL;Sadly, he later became a drug addict and stopped being cool. Because of training however, he managed to get back on track.$NL;$NL;Most recently, you could see him do this weird things with two trucks. That shit was fucked up. You should check it out if you haven't.
tran_text: 熊貓尚格－雲頓曾經是各種瘋狂事蹟中的熱門人物。 $NL;$NL;可惜，他後來沉迷於毒品，風光不再。然而經過訓練後，他又東山再起了。 $NL;$NL;最近，你可以看到他帶著兩輛卡車做著一些奇怪的事情。這玩意完蛋了。你最好檢查一下。

orig_text: They might have not known what they did and to who, but that doesn't matter. They got what they deserved and then some. John is back.

A plague doctor mask for the Mastermind.$NL;$NL;In the words of the Bhagavad-Gita: "Now I am become death, destroyer of worlds."$NL;$NL;Or at least, that was the art direction.$NL;$NL;This mask is an Infamy tree reward. It can't drop during a PAYDAY and it can't be sold. Instead, it can be returned to your mask stash for free, but any pattern, color or material as well as the customization fee to put these together will be lost.
tran_text: 黑手的瘟疫醫生面具。 $NL;$NL;在《薄伽梵歌》中提到：「現在吾即為死亡，世界之毀滅者。」$NL;$NL;或者說，至少這算是個藝術品。 $NL;$NL;此面具為惡名樹獎勵。它不會在收穫日中掉落，也無法出售。它可以被免費放回面具庫中，但所有的改裝與花費都不會退回。

orig_text: Graham enjoys long walks in the sun.$NL;$NL;Rabbits are small mammals that practically can be found anywhere. If confronted by a potential threat, rabbits will instantly freeze and warn others in the warren with powerful thumps on the ground.$NL;$NL;When fleeing, they hop in a zig-zag pattern, much like many Counter-Strike players do.
tran_text: 格林漢姆很享受在太陽底下漫步。$NL;$NL;兔子是隨處可見的小型哺乳類動物。當牠們察覺到潛在的危險時，兔子會立即停下來並用力踢地來警告養兔場內的同伴。$NL;$NL;逃跑時兔子會不斷跳躍並快速轉彎變換移動路徑，就如同大多數的ＣＳ玩家一樣。

orig_text: The Female Mannequin.$NL;$NL;The face of an articulated doll used by tailors, dressmakers, artists, windowdressers and now bank robbers.$NL;$NL;They are most often used to display or fit clothing, but are also used to simulate how to teach first aid, CPR, tracheal intubation and now bank robbery.
tran_text: 女性模特。 $NL;$NL;這張面具曾用於裁縫，服裝師，藝術家，櫥窗設計員，而現在是劫匪。 $NL;$NL;它們一般用於展示或與服裝配套，不過也用於急救教學，心肺復蘇，胸部插管，現在還有銀行搶劫。

orig_text: Santa, more known as Santa Claus, Saint Nicholas, Father Christmas and Kris Kringle (?) is a man of epic proportions. Words like legendary, mythical, historical and folkloric best describe this beast of a man.$NL;$NL;This particular mask is the Surprised Santa mask. Who knows why he's surprised? Maybe someone stole his sled? Maybe someone stole his reindeers? Maybe he just saw someone rob a bank?
tran_text: 聖誕老人也被稱作桑塔克勞斯，聖尼古拉斯，聖誕之父和克里斯克林格（？），是一個史詩般的人物。像傳奇，神秘，歷史和民俗這類字眼最適合形容他。 $NL;$NL;這個特別的面具是驚訝聖誕老人。誰知道他為什麼驚訝？有人偷了他的雪橇？或者他的馴鹿？又或者他看見有人在搶銀行？

orig_text: Get over here! And let me tell you about the most badass ninjas you ever heard about. They are the protectors of our world and they only accept the best warriors. They are given the most kickass mask to show that they are better than everyone else. Here is your mask, welcome to the clan.
tran_text: Get over here！然後讓我告訴你有關世上最惡棍的忍者的事吧。他們是我們這個世界的守護者，而且他們只接受最強的戰士。他們被賜予最屌的面具以彰顯他們比任何人都強。來，這是你的面具，歡迎加入我們。

orig_text: Steven the silverback gorilla. Not only is he fucking huge, he's strong as hell too. He can break your back by just looking at you. You'll be hospitilized for weeks. Not only that, but there'll be months of therapy as well. Do you know how hard it is learning to walk again? Want to know what else that is hard? Steven's muscles. 22 years ago he worked as a chef on a military ship. Killed everyone in 103 minutes.
tran_text: 史蒂文是只銀背大猩猩。他不僅十分高大，還特別強壯。他看你一眼都能把你折斷。你要在醫院裡躺上好幾個星期，還要接受幾個月的心理治療。你知道重新學會走路有多難嗎？想知道還有什麼很牛逼嗎？史蒂文的肌肉。 22年前他在一艘軍艦上當大廚。 103分鐘內殺掉了所有人。

orig_text: A strange thing, the human skull. Humans can often recognize a human skull, even if it's only partially shown. The human brain even has a specific region for it.
tran_text: 一個怪東西，是個人類頭骨。只要是人類就能認得人類的頭骨，就算只看見一部分，因為頭骨的特定位置有著人腦。

orig_text: Soar high, swoop down and strike your prey with merciless, deadly claws. Then fly home to your lofty nest, enjoying the spoils of your hunt. You are the apex predator and you shall devour it all.

The giraffe doesn't miss a thing, always in complete control of its surroundings, acting as the perfect "look-out" companion for heisting in the animal kingdom. Whatever it is, you'll see it coming miles away and the cops can forget to take you by surprise.
tran_text: 長頸鹿不會忽略任何東西，永遠對周圍有完全了解，在動物界作為完美「警覺」的同伴。無論如何，你將會看到一英里外的東西及條子會太驚訝而忘了打你。

orig_text: A seasoned heister over the festival period, the Strinch has been stealing Christmases since 1957. Also linked with the Halloween Heist of 1972.
tran_text: 綠草人是個節日期間的大盜，從1957年開始偷竊聖誕樹，還和1972年的萬聖節劫案有關。

orig_text: Vincent the Velociraptor and his best friend Andreas Häll Penninger the Protoceratops were out and about one day in the jungle when they got in a fight. It wasn't a big thing really but Vincent just wouldn't let it go. Andreas, being the stubborn Protoceratops he was, continued to mouth off to Vincent. Violent fighting ensued and to this day, no one is sure who actually won.
tran_text: 迅猛龍 Vincent 和他最好的朋友原角龍安德烈斯·潘寧格有天去森林時打了起來。本來不是什麼大事，但文森特就是死抓著不放。作為十分固執的原角龍，安德烈斯咬了 Vincen 一口。雙方戰況激烈，沒人知道最後到底誰贏了。

orig_text: A scientist inspired by the virtual-reality sex scene in Demolition Man made his own attempt at building a device where no physical contact would actually be needed when performing intercourse. The experiment was an utter failure but a few of the early prototypes still exist.
tran_text: 科學家被超級戰警內虛擬實境的性畫面所激勵，所以嘗試了建造一個工具那是當進行性交時沒有需要有物理上的接觸。實驗失敗了但有一些少數的原型仍存在。

orig_text: In the small village of Pomtsburg, you can find a small monument. Few read the plaque covered with moss, but it holds the tale of a young boy. As the Germans came marching into Pomtsburg he lead the resistance with bravery and determination. Pomtsburg was his birthplace and no one were to destroy it. The Battle of Pomtsburg never reached the history books, and few even remember how it ended. But the boy managed to steal this souvenir. Something to remind him and others that you shall always stand up to oppression.

This item popped up at an auction in North France during the 1990s. Among the auction goers sat a woman in her 50s. She recognized it and even though she could not remember the name of the officer who wore it, she paid a hefty sum for it. As a young girl she visited a square to buy vegetables when paratroopers came dropping down. Gunfire, explosions and screams of fear and pain filled the air. The officer took her to a shelter in a government building. He had no reason but kindness to save her. But even as his life was on stake, he risked it to save hers. She was just a young girl, but still recognized the hat.
The Mega Wolf mask is an evolved version of the original mask. It symbolises transcendence and catharsis.$NL;$NL;Thank you for your support.$NL;$NL;OVERKILL salutes you!
tran_text: Mega Wolf是原有的Wolf面具的進化版，它象徵了超越與淨化。$NL;$NL;感謝你的支持。$NL;$NL;OVERKILL對你敬禮！

orig_text: You lock your eyes on your prize until they water. Unattended, your slacking jaw lets slip a drop of saliva onto the floor as the need for possession takes over. The person you pine for is an object, the object is a person. It matters not, to your blinded senses.

Like a sword hidden in the user's hand the shuriken is a deadly weapon and perfectly silent. First made of nails and needles, the throwing star has had a long history filled with blood and battle. These modern stars of stainless steel will pose a lethal threat to anyone in front of you, and as long as you can find them there will be no stopping you.$NL;$NL;The Shurikens have been coated in poison which deals damage over time and has a chance to interrupt enemies.
tran_text: 如同袖箭，六方手裏劍是種完美無聲且致命的武器。最早是由釘子和針製作而成，這顆可投擲的星星擁有著充滿了著血和火的悠久歷史。這些現代的不銹鋼星星會對出現在你面前的任何敵人造成致命威脅，只要你事先發現他們你就無所畏懼$NL;$NL;淬滿了毒藥的六方手裏劍會對敵人造成持續傷害並有機率能夠打斷敵人的攻擊。

orig_text: With its origins lost in murky pre-history, the javelin is a simple weapon. After all, it's a thrown stick with a pointy end that ruins someone's day. Despite this simplicity, it still requires skill and strength to use.
tran_text: 標槍的起源遺失在歷史洪流之中，它就是個簡單的武器。畢竟它只是個一端尖頭可投擲的木棍，隨時可以結束某人的餘生。儘管它如此簡單，依然需要技巧和力量才能使用。

The Apex is a gift to Rust from his compadre - The Mechanic. Rust would often run out of shotgun shells and just beat the living crap out of people. So his beloved bringer of death - the Breaker shotgun - got some neat modifications. Thusly creating the Apex. In this way, the amount of shotgun shells isn't an issue.
tran_text: Apex 是 Rus t的教父－－技師－－所給的禮物。 Rust 常用完霰彈槍子彈後，就只能徒手把人打個半死。所以他最愛的殺人武器－－ Breaker 霰彈槍－－得到了一點俐落的改造，於是就有了 Apex 。這樣，霰彈槍的子彈數量就再也不是問題了。

orig_text: It may have been many years since it was crafted by a true artisan gunsmith. Handed from father to son in a lineage of pressed uniforms and polished brass, until it finally found its proper purpose; bringing chaos and carnage. It was found in a collection of treasures and other spoils of war. This pistol finally saw some real action, not in the hands of war heroes at the brink of history but criminals who can truly appreciate the beauty of a well crafted firearm.
A hand-crafted Deagle built as testament to the finest gaming-trained crackshot in the world. Legendary skins can't be modified.
tran_text: 為了全世界最優秀的電競神槍手而親手打造的Deagle手槍。傳說性塗裝無法裝上組件。

orig_text: Tecci is a notorious gunsmith that travels to wherever the money is. He's a veteran and knows everything there is to know about weapons. Anarcho is a classic Tecci creation that's in high demand due to it's very limited edition. Nobody knows Tecci's real name or origin, and nobody asks - because if you do, he'll bring down some serious Taekwondo on everything you hold dear.
tran_text: Tecci 是個惡名昭彰的槍匠，無論錢在哪裡，他就去哪裡。他的經驗老道，沒有什麼跟武器有關的事情是他不知道的。 Anarcho 就是一個經典的 Tecci 作品，由於數量稀少所以非常搶手。沒有知道 Tecci 的真名，也沒有人會去問。因為如果你問了的話，他就會對你最心愛的東西來點跆拳道。

orig_text: Once owned by a wealthy naval officer but squandered by his errant offspring, this beautiful and expensive shotgun finally found its way to the criminal underworld, where it shall finally fulfill its destiny of death and destruction.
tran_text: 曾被一個富有的海軍軍官所持有但錯誤的後代揮霍無度而失去，這美麗而貴重的霰彈槍終於在犯罪中的世界出現，但它已被死亡及破壞填滿了。

orig_text: The steel in The Gimp has been re-cycled from weapons used in battle in Desert Storm, the Falklands, Operation Market Garden, the Somme and the Boer war.

The AMR-16 wasn't really all it could be, and as the future is at our doorstep it was due for an upgrade. Only a few grams of Astatine exists on the Earth, but Akan managed to get some. This radioactive substance amped the AMR-16 and transformed it to the Astatoz. The only problem is that Astatine is a bit unstable - but also deadly. So proceed with caution.
tran_text: AMR-16 的潛力絕對不只這樣，而當未來已經近在眼前的這個當下，是時候該升級一下了。整顆地球上的砈元素也不過幾公克，但是 Akan 想辦法搞到了一點。這個放射性元素激發了 AMR-16 並將它轉化成 Astatoz 。唯一的問題是砈有一點不穩定，但同時也很致命。請小心謹慎。

orig_text: This is the gun once used by the legendary Mexican bank robber El Toro Furioso, famous for his daring one-man heists.
tran_text: 這是墨西哥銀行劫匪 El Toro Furioso 用過的槍，在他最著名的一人劫案中用。

orig_text: Legendary heister Afano "Rocky" Jones, honored the traditions of his Samoan ancestors and satisfied his lust for thrills by etching his shotgun with tattoos that symbolize one of his greatest achievements - the completion of the Ozaki 8.
tran_text: 傳奇劫匪阿法洛「洛奇」瓊斯，祟拜他的薩摩亞祖先及靠蝕刻紋身在霰彈槍上來滿足他對驚險刺激的慾望，那是代表他的最重大的成就－完成了 Ozaki 8 挑戰。

orig_text: Sometimes, a gun is not just a gun. It holds a spirit inside. As the wielder grabs it, a feeling of power courses through their veins, infusing them with a desire for destruction. Then hell is unleashed. This is what we call the Demon.
tran_text: 有時，槍不只是槍，它入面有靈魂，主人拿它，會感到有力量流經靜脈，輸入破壞的慾望，地獄被放出來，我們叫它惡魔。

orig_text: A weapon of war and vengeance, this rifle is the perfect tool for hurting those who've hurt you. And for striking first and striking hard at others who would.
tran_text: 戰爭及復仇的武器，這步槍傷害傷害你的人很有效，以及先打擊後依舊有效打擊。

orig_text: He knows where you are sleeping, he knows when you're asleep.$NL;He penetrates the perimeter through the chimney, like a fucking creep.$NL;Be ready for his wrath, your presents undeserved.$NL;It's too late, he opened fire, your screams will not be heard.
tran_text: 他知道你睡在哪兒，他知道你何時入睡.$NL;他從煙囪悄悄潛入，和該死的怪物一樣。$NL;準備接受他的憤怒，你絕對不想得到的禮物。$NL;太遲啦，他已出動，你的尖叫無人聽到。

orig_text: The Compact 40mm Grenade Launcher is nice and tidy
The weapon that tamed the West.

He did not exist, not officially. Not since he came aboard Zeal, the top-secret strike force. He was always the last resort, deployed when extreme violence was needed. He never held back. For every operation, he lost a bit of his humanity. For every operation, he gained an edge as an instrument of death. He did not separate right from wrong, not anymore. Only obeyed the orders from above. Just one shadow in the dark legion of secret super soldiers. One day, he woke up and could only think of killing others. He had finally found his true purpose.

Nationality: Irish$NL;Age: 27$NL;$NL;Clover grew up in a rough house in a rough part of town. Her ancestors were fighters in every generation, and she is fiercely dedicated to her Irish heritage. She wears the clovers for luck, as well as a way to say "I'm Irish, and I'm proud".
tran_text: 國籍：愛爾蘭$NL;年齡：27$NL;$NL;Clover從困苦的環境中長大。她的祖先代代都是戰士，而且她致力於保留愛爾蘭的傳統。她戴上幸運草祈求幸運，就像是跟他人說「我是愛爾蘭人我驕傲」。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Clover做為你的預設角色，如果她是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: Nationality: Swedish$NL;Age: 34$NL;$NL;Wolf was a law abiding citizen for most of his life. During the worldwide economic slump of the late 2000's, Wolf's company temporarily had only one client that got cold feet and wanted out. His company went bankrupt.$NL;$NL;He now pursues a criminal career with the same determination that drove him when he used to run his company.
tran_text: 國籍：瑞典$NL;年齡：34$NL;$NL;原本只是個在軟體公司上班的模範小市民，家中有一妻二子。但是2000年歐洲經濟衰退後，公司失去一半以上的客戶而倒閉。$NL;$NL;Wolf失去了房子與家庭，成了流浪漢。之後，他開始染上精神疾病，會模仿電影裡的犯罪情節來進行犯罪。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Wolf做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: This is a Paydaycon 2016 secret mask item!
tran_text: 這是一件 PAYDAYCON 2016 神秘面具物品！

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 44$NL;$NL;Experienced, cunning, methodical. At the age of 30 he tried to play two of Chicago's mob families against each other. It went south and several mob bosses ordered Dallas' head on a plate, but somehow he managed to go underground and survive. After things calmed down he worked his way back up the criminal ladder.$NL;$NL;Now he's the face that everyone fears.
tran_text: 國籍：美國$NL;年齡：44$NL;$NL;Dallas他不僅經驗豐富、狡猾也有條不紊。他在團隊裡做事當然不會出差池，但他明顯不是會讓人感到合作愉快的那類人。他自問是神一般的策劃人，亦嚴格要求身邊的成員別成為豬一樣的隊友。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Dallas做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。

orig_text: Nationality: American$NL;Age: 37$NL;$NL;As a teenager, Chains always got into trouble. After years of jumping between foster homes and juvenile institutions , he ended up in the military. There he became an excellent soldier but he always hated being told what to do.$NL;$NL;Chains left the military and became a soldier of fortune, offering his military expertise to the highest bidder.
tran_text: 國籍：美國$NL;年齡：37$NL;$NL;在青少年時期。 Chains總是惹上許多麻煩。經過在寄養家庭和青少年機構之間不斷往返的歲月後，他最後選擇了從軍。在那裡他成為了優秀的軍人。$NL;$NL;當你選擇Chains做為你的預設角色，如果他是空置的你就可以一直使用。
